46790.en:
<voice 00460_00046790><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Hey, Mishua! What do you think it takes to
be a hero?<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46790.ja:
<voice 00460_00046790><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「なあ！　ミシュアねえちゃん！
　英雄に必要なものって　なんだと思う？<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46790.ko:
<voice 00460_00046790><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 있잖아! 미슈아 누나!
　영웅한테 필요한 게 뭐라고 생각해?<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46790.zh-Hans:
<voice 00460_00046790><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>哎！米修娅姐姐！
你觉得英雄最需要的是什么？<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46790.zh-Hant:
<voice 00460_00046790><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>欸！蜜雪雅姊姊！
你覺得英雄需要有什麼特質？<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46791.en: <voice 00670_00046791><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>A Hero...? Well...<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46791.ja: <voice 00670_00046791><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「英雄に……　必要なもの？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46791.ko: <voice 00670_00046791><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 영웅한테…… 필요한 거?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46791.zh-Hans: <voice 00670_00046791><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>英雄……最需要的？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46791.zh-Hant: <voice 00670_00046791><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>英雄……需要的特質？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46792.en: <voice 00720_00046792><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Maybe... Strength, wisdom, and courage?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46792.ja:
<voice 00720_00046792><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「そうね。チカラ……　知恵……
　それとも……　勇気かしら？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46792.ko:
<voice 00720_00046792><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 글쎄, 힘…… 지혜……
　아니면…… 용기?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46792.zh-Hans:
<voice 00720_00046792><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我想想，是力量……智慧……
还是……勇气呢？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46792.zh-Hant:
<voice 00720_00046792><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我想想，是力量……智慧……
還是……勇氣呢？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46793.en:
<voice 00790_00046793><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Bzzzt! Wrong! This is what the hero Zankrone
said once!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46793.ja:
<voice 00790_00046793><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「ブブー　はずれ。
　英雄ザンクローネ様は　こう言ったんだ！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46793.ko:
<voice 00790_00046793><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 땡~ 틀렸어.
　영웅 장크로네 님은 이렇게 말했어!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46793.zh-Hans:
<voice 00790_00046793><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>不对，你猜错了。
英雄赞库罗尼大人是这么说的！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46793.zh-Hant:
<voice 00790_00046793><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>不對，妳猜錯了。
英雄桑克朗大人是這麼說的！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46794.en:
<voice 00906_00046794><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>"All it takes to be a hero is to have guts!"
Cool, huh?<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46794.ja:
<voice 00906_00046794><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「英雄に必要なもんは　ふてぶてしさだっ！
　ってさ！　イカすだろ！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46794.ko:
<voice 00906_00046794><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 영웅에게 필요한 건 뻔뻔함이다!
　어때? 멋지지!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46794.zh-Hans:
<voice 00906_00046794><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>英雄最需要的是
厚脸皮！是不是很帅啊？<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46794.zh-Hant:
<voice 00906_00046794><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>英雄需要的是
厚臉皮！是不是很帥啊？<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46795.en: <voice 01035_00046795><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Wow, he certaintly sounds like a hero.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46795.ja: <voice 01035_00046795><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「まあっ。すごい英雄さんね。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46795.ko: <voice 01035_00046795><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 어머나, 굉장한 영웅이네.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46795.zh-Hans: <voice 01035_00046795><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>嗯，真是一个不得了的英雄啊。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46795.zh-Hant: <voice 01035_00046795><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>嗯，真是一個不得了的英雄啊。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46796.en:
<voice 01127_00046796><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>And then Zankrone swings his fiery sword
around, the Blaze Sword, just like this!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46796.ja:
<voice 01127_00046796><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「それから　ザンクローネ様は
　魔炎の大剣　火燐刀をブン回して……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46796.ko:
<voice 01127_00046796><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 그리고 장크로네 님은
　마염의 대검 카린토를 거침없이 휘둘러서……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46796.zh-Hans:
<voice 01127_00046796><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>还有，赞库罗尼大人挥舞起
魔炎大剑·火磷刀……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46796.zh-Hant:
<voice 01127_00046796><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>然後，桑克朗大人揮舞起
魔炎大劍‧火燐刀……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46797.en:
<voice 01229_00046797><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>CHOP! WHAM! And then he sliced the
monster in half!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46797.ja:
<voice 01229_00046797><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「ザクーーーッ！　メコメコーッ！　って
　化け物を　まっぷたつにしたんだぜ！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46797.ko:
<voice 01229_00046797><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 푸욱! 촤악, 촤악~! 하고
　괴물을 반으로 갈라 버렸어!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46797.zh-Hans:
<voice 01229_00046797><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>“喀擦！”一声！就把
怪物劈成两半了！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46797.zh-Hant:
<voice 01229_00046797><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「喀擦！」一聲！就把
怪物劈成兩半了！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46798.en:
<voice 01303_00046798><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Wow, Raska. You must be Zankrone's
biggest fan, huh?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46798.ja:
<voice 01303_00046798><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「うふふ。ラスカは　本当に
　ザンクローネ様が好きなのね。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46798.ko:
<voice 01303_00046798><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 우후후, 라스카는 정말
　장크로네 님을 좋아하는구나.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46798.zh-Hans:
<voice 01303_00046798><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>呵呵，你还真喜欢
赞库罗尼大人啊。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46798.zh-Hant:
<voice 01303_00046798><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>呵呵，你還真喜歡
桑克朗大人啊。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46799.en: <voice 01436_00046799><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>You betcha! He's the Hero of Melsandy Village!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46799.ja:
<voice 01436_00046799><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「あったりめーだよ！
　オレたちの　メルサンディ村の英雄だもん！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46799.ko:
<voice 01436_00046799><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 당연하지!
　우리 메르상디 마을의 영웅이잖아!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46799.zh-Hans:
<voice 01436_00046799><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>那还用说！
他是我们梅尔桑蒂村的英雄！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46799.zh-Hant:
<voice 01436_00046799><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>那還用說！
他是我們梅爾桑蒂村的英雄！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46800.en: <voice 01943_00046800><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Oh, a traveler...?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46800.ja: <voice 01943_00046800><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「あら　旅の方……？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46800.ko: <voice 01943_00046800><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 어머나, 여행자세요……?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46800.zh-Hans: <voice 01943_00046800><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>哎呀，你们是旅行者吗……？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46800.zh-Hant: <voice 01943_00046800><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>哎呀，你們是旅行者嗎……？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46801.en: <voice 01998_00046801><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Welcome to Melsandy Village!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46801.ja: <voice 01998_00046801><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「メルサンディ村へ　ようこそ！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46801.ko: <voice 01998_00046801><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 메르상디 마을에 잘 오셨어요!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46801.zh-Hans: <voice 01998_00046801><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>欢迎来到梅尔桑蒂村！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46801.zh-Hant: <voice 01998_00046801><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>歡迎來到梅爾桑蒂村！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46802.en: <voice 02113_00046802><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>Stop right there!<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46802.ja: <voice 02113_00046802><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>「ちょっと　待ちな！<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46802.ko: <voice 02113_00046802><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>: 잠깐 기다려!<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46802.zh-Hans: <voice 02113_00046802><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>给我等一下！<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46802.zh-Hant: <voice 02113_00046802><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>給我等一下！<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46803.en:
<voice 02243_00046803><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>Who the heck are you? And why did you
come to this village!?<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46803.ja:
<voice 02243_00046803><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>「てめえ　なにもんだ！
　俺らの村に　なんの用で来たべ！<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46803.ko:
<voice 02243_00046803><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>: 당신, 누구야!?
　우리 마을엔 뭐 하러 왔어!?<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46803.zh-Hans:
<voice 02243_00046803><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>你们是谁？
来我们村子干嘛？<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46803.zh-Hant:
<voice 02243_00046803><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>你們是誰？
來我們村子幹嘛？<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46804.en:
<voice 02423_00046804><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>I've never seen you before and you look
suspicious. Maybe you're working for that
monster!<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46804.ja:
<voice 02423_00046804><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>「この辺じゃ　見かけねえな。
　……あやしい奴だ。
　もしや……　あの化け物の手先か！！<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46804.ko:
<voice 02423_00046804><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>: 이 주변에선 못 보던 얼굴이군.
　……수상한데.
　설마…… 그 괴물의 끄나풀인가!?<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46804.zh-Hans:
<voice 02423_00046804><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>我没在这附近见过你们。
……真可疑。
该不会……是那个怪物的手下吧？！<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46804.zh-Hant:
<voice 02423_00046804><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>是這一帶沒見過的生面孔。
……還真可疑。
該不會是……那個怪物的手下吧！？<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46805.en:
<voice 02578_00046805><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Mr. Saval, it's not nice to make assumptions
like that. This person doesn't look bad.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46805.ja:
<voice 02578_00046805><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「サヴァルさん。そんな決めつけは　よくないわ。
　私には　悪い方に見えません。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46805.ko:
<voice 02578_00046805><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 사바르 씨, 그렇게 덮어놓고 의심하면 안 돼요.
　제겐 나쁜 분처럼 보이지 않는걸요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46805.zh-Hans:
<voice 02578_00046805><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>撒巴尔，别急着下结论。
我倒觉得他们看起来不像坏人。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46805.zh-Hant:
<voice 02578_00046805><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>薩瓦爾，別急著下結論。
我倒覺得他們看起來不像壞人。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46806.en:
<voice 02638_00046806><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Yeah! And my dad said you gotta be nice to
travelers!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46806.ja:
<voice 02638_00046806><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「そーだぞ！　旅人には優しくしろって
　とーちゃんも言ってたぞ！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46806.ko:
<voice 02638_00046806><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 맞아! 아빠도 여행자한테는
　친절하게 대해 주라고 했어!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46806.zh-Hans:
<voice 02638_00046806><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>对啊！爸爸说过，
要亲切对待旅行者！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46806.zh-Hant:
<voice 02638_00046806><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>對啊！爸爸有說過，
要親切對待旅行者！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46807.en:
<voice 02743_00046807><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Saval, you gotta be nicer to people! Just like
Zankrone!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46807.ja:
<voice 02743_00046807><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「サヴァル兄は　もっとカンダイになれよなー。
　ザンクローネ様みたいにさ！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46807.ko:
<voice 02743_00046807><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 사바르 형은 좀 관대해질 필요가 있어.
　장크로네 님처럼 말이야!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46807.zh-Hans:
<voice 02743_00046807><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>撒巴尔哥哥应该宽宏大量一点！
就像赞库罗尼大人那样！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46807.zh-Hant:
<voice 02743_00046807><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>薩瓦爾哥哥應該要寬宏大量一點！
就像桑克朗大人那樣！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46808.en: <voice 02848_00046808><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>Y-yeah... Got it. Sorry about that.<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46808.ja:
<voice 02848_00046808><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>「わ……わかったよ。
　お前たちにゃ　かなわねぇさ。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46808.ko:
<voice 02848_00046808><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>: 아…… 알았어.
　너희한테는 못 당하겠군.<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46808.zh-Hans:
<voice 02848_00046808><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>好……好了，
真是说不过你们。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46808.zh-Hant:
<voice 02848_00046808><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>好……好啦，
真是說不過你們。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46809.en:
<voice 02968_00046809><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>But, hey... Kids shouldn't be wandering around
out here this late.
Same goes for you, Mishua.<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46809.ja:
<voice 02968_00046809><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>「でもな。子供が　こんな時に
　外をウロウロすんじゃないよ。
　ミシュアさん……　あんたもだべ。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46809.ko:
<voice 02968_00046809><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>: 하지만 이런 시기에
　어린애가 바깥을 돌아다니면 못써.
　미슈아 씨…… 당신도 그렇고.<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46809.zh-Hans:
<voice 02968_00046809><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>话说，孩子不应该
在这种时候还在外面乱晃。
米修娅……你也一样。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46809.zh-Hant:
<voice 02968_00046809><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>話說，小孩子不應該
在這種時候在外面亂晃。
蜜雪雅……你也一樣。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46810.en:
<voice 03136_00046810><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>Sorry about that, traveler. I just wasn't
expecting anyone to show up at a time like
this...<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46810.ja:
<voice 03136_00046810><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>「悪かったな　旅人さんよ。
　だが　あんたも　こんな時に
　来ちまうなんてな……。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46810.ko:
<voice 03136_00046810><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>: 미안했수다, 여행자 양반.
　하지만 댁도 하필이면
　이럴 때 오다니…….<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46810.zh-Hans:
<voice 03136_00046810><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>抱歉，旅行者。
不过，
你们来得还真不是时候……<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46810.zh-Hant:
<voice 03136_00046810><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>抱歉，旅行者。
不過，你們也來得
還真不是時候……<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46811.en: <voice 03446_00046811><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Come on, let's go.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46811.ja: <voice 03446_00046811><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「さあ　まいりましょう。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46811.ko: <voice 03446_00046811><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 자, 들어가요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46811.zh-Hans: <voice 03446_00046811><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>好了，我们走吧。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46811.zh-Hant: <voice 03446_00046811><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>好了，我們走吧。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46812.en:
<voice 03476_00046812><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>The chief will be more than happy to see a
traveler has come here. Please drop by my
house when you can.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46812.ja:
<voice 03476_00046812><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「旅の方が　いらっしゃったと知ったら
　村長さんも　よろこぶわ。
　ぜひ　家に寄っていってくださいね。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46812.ko:
<voice 03476_00046812><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 여행자가 왔다는 걸 알면
　촌장님도 좋아하실 거예요.
　꼭 저희 집에 들렀다 가세요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46812.zh-Hans:
<voice 03476_00046812><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>要是村长知道有旅行者来临，
他一定会很开心。
请务必去拜访他一下。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46812.zh-Hant:
<voice 03476_00046812><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>要是知道有旅行者光臨，
村長一定會很開心的。
請務必去拜訪他一下。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46813.en:
<voice 00205_00046813><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Dad! Don't push yourself so hard!
You're still injured!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46813.ja:
<voice 00205_00046813><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「とーちゃんは　ケガしてんだから
　無理すんなって！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46813.ko:
<voice 00205_00046813><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 아빠는 다쳤으니까
　무리하지 말래도!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46813.zh-Hans:
<voice 00205_00046813><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>爸爸，你已经受伤了，
别太勉强自己！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46813.zh-Hant:
<voice 00205_00046813><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>爸爸，你已經受傷了，
別太勉強自己！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46814.en:
<voice 00278_00046814><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>If the monster shows up again, I'm sure
Zankrone will be there to save us!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46814.ja:
<voice 00278_00046814><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「もし　また化け物が現れても
　ザンクローネ様が　絶対　助けにきてくれるよ！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46814.ko:
<voice 00278_00046814><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 만약 또 괴물이 나타나도
　장크로네 님이 꼭 구하러 와 줄 거야!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46814.zh-Hans:
<voice 00278_00046814><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>即使怪物再出现，
赞库罗尼大人也一定会来拯救我们的！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46814.zh-Hant:
<voice 00278_00046814><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>即使怪物再出現，
桑克朗大人也一定會來拯救我們的！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46815.en:
<voice 00381_00046815><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>Raska, I know you saw it too.
How Zankrone died...<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46815.ja:
<voice 00381_00046815><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「ラスカ　お前も見ただろう。
　ザンクローネ様が　死んじまったとこを……。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46815.ko:
<voice 00381_00046815><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 라스카, 너도 봤잖냐.
　장크로네 님이 죽은 걸…….<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46815.zh-Hans:
<voice 00381_00046815><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>拉斯卡，你不是亲眼看到了吗？
赞库罗尼大人已经死了……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46815.zh-Hant:
<voice 00381_00046815><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>拉斯卡，你不是親眼看到了嗎？
桑克朗大人已經死了……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46816.en:
<voice 00476_00046816><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Zankrone's a hero! He'd never let a monster
like that beat him!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46816.ja:
<voice 00476_00046816><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「ザンクローネ様は　英雄なんだ！
　化け物なんかに　やられたりしねえよ！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46816.ko:
<voice 00476_00046816><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 장크로네 님은 영웅이야!
　그깟 괴물한텐 안 죽어!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46816.zh-Hans:
<voice 00476_00046816><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>赞库罗尼大人是英雄！
他绝对不会被怪物杀死！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46816.zh-Hant:
<voice 00476_00046816><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>桑克朗大人是英雄！
他絕對不會被怪物殺死的！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46817.en: <voice 00566_00046817><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>Hero or not, stop being so delusional!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46817.ja:
<voice 00566_00046817><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「英雄だろうが　なんだろうが
　ダメなときはダメだべぇ！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46817.ko:
<voice 00566_00046817><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 영웅이든 뭐든
　죽을 땐 죽는 거다!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46817.zh-Hans:
<voice 00566_00046817><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>就算是英雄，
也有做不到的事！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46817.zh-Hant:
<voice 00566_00046817><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>就算是英雄，
也有辦不到的事情！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46819.en:
<voice 00731_00046819><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>You're a traveler, aren't you? Of course!
Welcome, welcome! I am the chief of this
village. Call me Gash!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46819.ja:
<voice 00731_00046819><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「あんた　まさか　旅人さんか？
　いんやァ　よく来なすった！
　俺が　この村の村長　ガッシュだべ！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46819.ko:
<voice 00731_00046819><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 그쪽은 혹시 여행자인가?
　이야, 정말 잘 왔어!
　내가 이 마을 촌장인 갓슈다!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46819.zh-Hans:
<voice 00731_00046819><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>你们是旅行者吗？
哎呀，欢迎来到我们的村子！
我是村长，名叫加修！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46819.zh-Hant:
<voice 00731_00046819><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>你們是旅行者嗎？
哎呀，歡迎來到我們的村子！
我是村長，叫做賈修！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46821.en: <voice 00941_00046821><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>A-are you okay!?<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46821.ja: <voice 00941_00046821><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「だ　大丈夫かよっ！？<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46821.ko: <voice 00941_00046821><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 괘, 괜찮아!?<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46821.zh-Hans: <voice 00941_00046821><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>你、你没事吧？！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46821.zh-Hant: <voice 00941_00046821><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>你、你沒事吧！？<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46822.en:
<voice 01061_00046822><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>Welcome to Melsandy Village! Sorry that I'm
not in the best shape to give you a proper
welcome, but...<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46822.ja:
<voice 01061_00046822><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「うぇるかむ　我がメルサンディ村へ！
　……と言っても　今は　ちょいと
　歓迎できる状態じゃないんだけどな……。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46822.ko:
<voice 01061_00046822><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 우리 메르상디 마을에 온 걸 환영한다!
　……말은 이렇게 해도 사실 지금은
　손님을 반길 만한 상황이 아니긴 하지만…….<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46822.zh-Hans:
<voice 01061_00046822><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>欢迎来到我们梅尔桑蒂村！
……不过，现在村里
出了点状况，很难好好接待客人……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46822.zh-Hant:
<voice 01061_00046822><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>歡迎來到我們梅爾桑蒂村！
……不過，現在村裡
出了點狀況，很難好好接待客人……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46824.en:
<voice 01211_00046824><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>You've seen it all, haven't you? The barren
fields, the dry wells, the broken houses, the
frightened villagers...<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46824.ja:
<voice 01211_00046824><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「お前さんも　ここに来るまでに見ただろうよ。
　やせた畑に　枯れた井戸　壊れた家……
　そして　おびえる村人たち……。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46824.ko:
<voice 01211_00046824><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 그쪽도 여기 오는 길에 봤지?
　황폐해진 밭, 말라붙은 우물, 무너진 집……
　그리고 겁먹은 마을 사람들…….<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46824.zh-Hans:
<voice 01211_00046824><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>你在来这里的路上应该也看到了。
贫瘠的田地、干枯的水井、毁坏的房屋……
还有害怕的村民们……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46824.zh-Hant:
<voice 01211_00046824><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>你在來這裡的路上應該也看到了。
貧瘠的田地、乾枯的水井、毀壞的房屋……
還有害怕的村民們……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46825.en:
<voice 01341_00046825><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>...The village has been attacked numerous
times by monsters of all kinds...<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46825.ja:
<voice 01341_00046825><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「……この村は　得体の知れねえ
　化け物に襲われとるんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46825.ko:
<voice 01341_00046825><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: ……이 마을은 정체를 알 수 없는
　괴물에게 공격받고 있어.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46825.zh-Hans:
<voice 01341_00046825><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>……这座村子被来历不明的
怪物袭击了。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46825.zh-Hant:
<voice 01341_00046825><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>……這座村子被來歷不明的
怪物襲擊了。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46826.en:
<voice 01456_00046826><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>The first time was a monster with big feet.
It suddenly appeared in the village and
began trampling the villagers.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46826.ja:
<voice 01456_00046826><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「はじめは　でかい足だった。
　でかい足の化け物が　突如　村に現れて
　村人たちを　踏みつぶしていきよった。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46826.ko:
<voice 01456_00046826><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 처음에는 거대한 발이었지.
　갑자기 거대한 발 괴물이 나타나서는
　마을 사람들을 짓밟았지 뭐냐.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46826.zh-Hans:
<voice 01456_00046826><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>最开始出现的是大脚。
大脚怪物突然出现在村里，
踩死了很多村民。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46826.zh-Hant:
<voice 01456_00046826><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>最一開始出現的是巨大的腳。
巨大的腳形怪物突然出現在村里，
踩死了很多村民。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46827.en:
<voice 01606_00046827><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>That's when the Hero Zankrone showed
up and got rid of it for us.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46827.ja:
<voice 01606_00046827><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「そのときは　村の英雄　ザンクローネ様が
　化け物を　退治してくれたのよ。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46827.ko:
<voice 01606_00046827><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 그때는 마을의 영웅인 장크로네 님이
　괴물을 물리쳐 줬지.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46827.zh-Hans:
<voice 01606_00046827><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>那个时候，村里的英雄
赞库罗尼大人击败了怪物。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46827.zh-Hant:
<voice 01606_00046827><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>那個時候，村裡的英雄
桑克朗大人擊敗了怪物。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46828.en:
<voice 01741_00046828><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>But, just the other day... A monster with a
big head appeared, and was flying around
the village...<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46828.ja:
<voice 01741_00046828><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「だけんど　先日……
　今度は　でかい頭の化け物が　現れおった。
　そいつは　村中を飛び回り……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46828.ko:
<voice 01741_00046828><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 하지만 얼마 전……
　이번에는 거대한 머리 괴물이 나타나서는
　온 마을을 뛰어다니며……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46828.zh-Hans:
<voice 01741_00046828><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>不过就在前几天……
又出现了一只大头怪物。
它在村里飞来飞去……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46828.zh-Hant:
<voice 01741_00046828><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>不過就在前幾天……
又出現了一隻頭形怪物。
牠在村裡飛來飛去……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46829.en: <voice 01826_00046829><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>It began eating the villagers whole!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46829.ja:
<voice 01826_00046829><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「村人たちを　かたっぱしから
　むしゃむしゃ食っちまったんだ！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46829.ko:
<voice 01826_00046829><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 마을 사람들을 닥치는 대로
　와그작와그작 먹어 치웠어!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46829.zh-Hans:
<voice 01826_00046829><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>把村民一个
接着一个吃掉了！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46829.zh-Hant:
<voice 01826_00046829><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>把村民一個
接著一個吃掉了！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46830.en:
<voice 01961_00046830><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>Since my leg is injured, I... I couldn't
do anything to help them...<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46830.ja:
<voice 01961_00046830><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「俺は　足にケガを負って……
　何も……　できなかった……。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46830.ko:
<voice 01961_00046830><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 난 다리를 다치는 바람에……
　아무것도…… 할 수 없었지…….<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46830.zh-Hans:
<voice 01961_00046830><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>我的脚受了伤……
什么忙……都帮不上……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46830.zh-Hant:
<voice 01961_00046830><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>我的腳受了傷……
什麼忙……都幫不上……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46831.en:
<voice 02081_00046831><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>...Zankrone still risked his life to fight for
the village. He fought the monster head on...<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46831.ja:
<voice 02081_00046831><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「……ザンクローネ様は　そのときも
　村のために　命を賭して戦ってくださった。
　そして　化け物と　相討ちになっただよ……。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46831.ko:
<voice 02081_00046831><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: ……장크로네 님은 그때도
　마을을 지키기 위해 목숨 걸고 싸웠어.
　그리고 괴물과 함께 죽었다…….<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46831.zh-Hans:
<voice 02081_00046831><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>……赞库罗尼大人在那个时候
又一次挺身而出，为了村子舍身对抗怪物。
最后和怪物同归于尽……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46831.zh-Hant:
<voice 02081_00046831><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>……桑克朗大人在那個時候
又一次挺身而出，為了村子捨身對抗怪物。
最後和怪物同歸於盡……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46832.en:
<voice 02146_00046832><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>And so the village lost all hope... The
villagers are all so anxious...<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46832.ja:
<voice 02146_00046832><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「だから　この村にはもう　救いはねえ。
　村人たちも　不安がるっちゅうもんだ……。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46832.ko:
<voice 02146_00046832><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 그 탓에 이제 이 마을에는 희망이 사라졌어.
　마을 사람들도 불안에 떨고 있지…….<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46832.zh-Hans:
<voice 02146_00046832><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>所以，这个村子已经没救了。
村民们会感到害怕是很正常的……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46832.zh-Hant:
<voice 02146_00046832><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>所以，這個村子已經沒救了。
村民們會感到害怕是很正常的……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46833.en: <voice 02236_00046833><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>I have to do what's best for the village...<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46833.ja: <voice 02236_00046833><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「今こそ　俺が　がんばらにゃ……。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46833.ko: <voice 02236_00046833><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 이럴 때일수록 내가 힘내야 해…….<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46833.zh-Hans: <voice 02236_00046833><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>这次我该振作起来了……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46833.zh-Hant: <voice 02236_00046833><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>這次我該振作起來了……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46834.en: <voice 02431_00046834><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>CHIEF GASH! I found this outside the village gate...<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46834.ja:
<voice 02431_00046834><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>「ガッシュのおやっさん！
　これが　村の門の外に……。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46834.ko:
<voice 02431_00046834><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>: 갓슈 아저씨!
　마을 문 밖에 이게…….<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46834.zh-Hans:
<voice 02431_00046834><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>加修大叔！
我在村子门外发现这个……<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46834.zh-Hant:
<voice 02431_00046834><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>賈修大叔！
我在村子門外發現這個……<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46835.en:
<voice 02606_00046835><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>Isn't that... The hat that Denny always wears?
What's going on!?<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46835.ja:
<voice 02606_00046835><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「こりゃ……　となりのデニーが
　いつもかぶってる帽子でねえか！
　な　何があっただー！？<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46835.ko:
<voice 02606_00046835><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 이건…… 옆집 데니가
　늘 쓰고 다니는 모자잖아!
　대, 대체 어떻게 된 거야!?<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46835.zh-Hans:
<voice 02606_00046835><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>这是……隔壁的丹尼
平常戴着的那顶帽子！
他、他出什么事了？！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46835.zh-Hant:
<voice 02606_00046835><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>這是……隔壁的丹尼
平常戴著的那頂帽子！
他、他出什麼事了！？<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46836.en: <voice 02711_00046836><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>Do you think the monster came back...?<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46836.ja:
<voice 02711_00046836><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>「もしかして　また
　化け物が現れたんじゃ……？<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46836.ko:
<voice 02711_00046836><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>: 혹시 또
　괴물이 나타난 거 아닐까……?<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46836.zh-Hans:
<voice 02711_00046836><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>该不会
又有怪物出现了……？<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46836.zh-Hant:
<voice 02711_00046836><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>該不會
又有怪物出現了……？<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46837.en:
<voice 02811_00046837><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Don't worry! I'm sure Zankrone will come to save the
day...<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46837.ja:
<voice 02811_00046837><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「心配すんなって！
　絶対　ザンクローネ様が助けに……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46837.ko:
<voice 02811_00046837><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 걱정할 것 없대도!
　장크로네 님이 꼭 구하러……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46837.zh-Hans:
<voice 02811_00046837><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>别担心！
赞库罗尼大人一定会来救……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46837.zh-Hant:
<voice 02811_00046837><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>別擔心啦！
桑克朗大人絕對會來救……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46838.en:
<voice 02926_00046838><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>Raska. Zankrone is no longer with us. We
can't rely on a dead hero to protect us
from monsters anymore.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46838.ja:
<voice 02926_00046838><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「ラスカ。ザンクローネ様は　もういねえんだ。 
　また　化け物が現れたかもしれんというときに
　死んだ英雄に　頼っとるわけにゃいかん。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46838.ko:
<voice 02926_00046838><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 라스카, 장크로네 님은 이제 없어. 
　언제 또 괴물이 나타날지 모르는 상황에
　죽은 영웅한테만 매달릴 순 없는 노릇 아니냐.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46838.zh-Hans:
<voice 02926_00046838><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>拉斯卡，赞库罗尼大人已经不在了。 
在这种怪物很可能又出现的时候，
我们不能依靠已经死了的英雄。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46838.zh-Hant:
<voice 02926_00046838><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>拉斯卡，桑克朗大人已經不在了。 
在這種怪物很可能又出現的時候，
我們不能依靠已經死掉的英雄。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46839.en:
<voice 03086_00046839><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>I told you already!!
Zankrone can never die...<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46839.ja:
<voice 03086_00046839><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「だから！！　ザンクローネ様は
　絶対に　死なない……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46839.ko:
<voice 03086_00046839><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 아냐!! 장크로네 님은
　절대 죽지 않는다고……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46839.zh-Hans:
<voice 03086_00046839><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>要我说几次你们才懂！
赞库罗尼大人他绝对不会死……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46839.zh-Hant:
<voice 03086_00046839><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>要我說幾次你們才懂！！
桑克朗大人他絕對不會死……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46840.en: <voice 03186_00046840><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>THAT'S ENOUGH, RASKA!!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46840.ja: <voice 03186_00046840><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「ええかげんにせんか　ラスカァ！！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46840.ko: <voice 03186_00046840><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 그만하지 못하겠냐, 라스카!!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46840.zh-Hans: <voice 03186_00046840><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>你别闹了，拉斯卡！！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46840.zh-Hant: <voice 03186_00046840><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>你別鬧了，拉斯卡！！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46842.en: <voice 03401_00046842><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Dad, you're just a big JERK!!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46842.ja: <voice 03401_00046842><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「とーちゃんの　バッキャロー！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46842.ko: <voice 03401_00046842><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 아빠는 바보야!!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46842.zh-Hans: <voice 03401_00046842><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>爸爸这个大笨蛋！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46842.zh-Hant: <voice 03401_00046842><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>爸爸這個大笨蛋！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46843.ja: <voice 03476_00046843><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「待たんか　ラスカ！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46843.ko: <voice 03476_00046843><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 거기 서, 라스카!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46843.zh-Hans: <voice 03476_00046843><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>站住，拉斯卡！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46843.zh-Hant: <voice 03476_00046843><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>站住，拉斯卡！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46844.en: <voice 03596_00046844><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Uncle, I'll go look for him.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46844.ja: <voice 03596_00046844><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「おじさま。私が見てまいります。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46844.ko: <voice 03596_00046844><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 아저씨, 제가 살펴보고 올게요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46844.zh-Hans: <voice 03596_00046844><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>叔叔，我去看看情况。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46844.zh-Hant: <voice 03596_00046844><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>叔叔，我去看看情況。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46845.en: <voice 03841_00046845><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>S-sorry, Mishua... Please be careful.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46845.ja:
<voice 03841_00046845><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「す　すまんな　ミシュア……。
　頼むベ……。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46845.ko:
<voice 03841_00046845><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 고, 고맙다, 미슈아…….
　부탁하마…….<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46845.zh-Hans:
<voice 03841_00046845><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>不、不好意思，米修娅……
麻烦你了……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46845.zh-Hant:
<voice 03841_00046845><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>不、不好意思，蜜雪雅……
麻煩妳了……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46846.en: <voice 04071_00046846><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>Mishua has a good head on her shoulders.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46846.ja: <voice 04071_00046846><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「ミシュアには　頭があがらんなあ。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46846.ko: <voice 04071_00046846><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 미슈아한텐 고개를 들 수가 없다니까.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46846.zh-Hans: <voice 04071_00046846><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>老是麻烦米修娅，真对不起她啊………<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46846.zh-Hant: <voice 04071_00046846><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>老是麻煩蜜雪雅，真對不起她啊………<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46847.en:
<voice 04217_00046847><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>...Uh-hmm. Saval, I want you to search the village right
away to try and find Denny.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46847.ja:
<voice 04217_00046847><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「……ウォッホン。
　サヴァル　すぐに村中を回って
　デニーの捜索にあたってくれい。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46847.ko:
<voice 04217_00046847><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: ……크흠.
　사바르, 당장 마을 안을 돌면서
　데니를 찾아봐 다오.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46847.zh-Hans:
<voice 04217_00046847><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>……咳咳。
撒巴尔，你马上去村子转一转，
帮忙找丹尼。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46847.zh-Hant:
<voice 04217_00046847><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>……咳咳。
薩瓦爾，你馬上去巡村子，
幫忙找丹尼。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46848.en:
<voice 04577_00046848><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>I apologize about such a terrible first
impression. As you can see, the village is
not in a good state right now...<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46848.ja:
<voice 04577_00046848><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「騒がしくて申し訳ねえだ　旅人さん。
　見ての通り　村は　大変な状況でよ……。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46848.ko:
<voice 04577_00046848><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 어수선해서 미안하군, 여행자 양반.
　보다시피 지금 상황이 상황인지라…….<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46848.zh-Hans:
<voice 04577_00046848><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>不好意思，让你见笑了，旅行者。
如你所见，这个村子碰上大麻烦了……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46848.zh-Hant:
<voice 04577_00046848><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>不好意思，讓你見笑了，旅行者。
如你所見，這個村子碰上大麻煩了……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46849.en:
<voice 04737_00046849><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>...Hmmm. You seem like you've seen your fair
share of adventures.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46849.ja:
<voice 04737_00046849><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「……ふむ。お前さん 
　どうやら　なかなか旅慣れていそうだべな。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46849.ko:
<voice 04737_00046849><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: ……흠, 여행자 양반
　이제 보니 여행에 이골이 난 것 같군.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46849.zh-Hans:
<voice 04737_00046849><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>……嗯，你的旅行经验
似乎非常丰富。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46849.zh-Hant:
<voice 04737_00046849><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>……嗯，你的旅行經驗
似乎非常豐富。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46850.en:
<voice 04762_00046850><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>Oh, you said your name was <pc>?
I hate to ask, but do you think you could
do me a favor?<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46850.ja:
<voice 04762_00046850><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「ほう。<pc>と言うだか。
　すまんが　<pc>
　ひとつ　頼まれてくれんか。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46850.ko:
<voice 04762_00046850><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 호오, 이름이 {pc}|hpp(이란,란) 말이지.
　미안하지만, <pc>
　내 부탁 하나만 들어 주겠나?<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46850.zh-Hans:
<voice 04762_00046850><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>哦，你叫<pc>啊。
不好意思，<pc>，
我有件事想拜托你。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46850.zh-Hant:
<voice 04762_00046850><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>喔，你叫<pc>啊。
不好意思，<pc>，
我有件事想拜託你。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46851.en:
<voice 04802_00046851><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>My mother is the manager of the Melan
Watermill, northwest of the village. I'm
worried about her being there all alone.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46851.ja:
<voice 04802_00046851><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「俺のおふくろは　村を出て　北西にある 
　メルン水車郷で　水車の管理人をしとるんだが
　あんな所に　ひとり置いとくのは心配でな。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46851.ko:
<voice 04802_00046851><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 우리 어머니는 마을 밖 북서쪽에 있는
　메른 물레방앗골에서 물레방아를 관리하시는데
　그런 곳에 혼자 두려니 걱정돼서 말이다.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46851.zh-Hans:
<voice 04802_00046851><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>我老妈在梅伦水车乡当水车管理员，
就在出了村子后的西北方。
她一个人在那边我不太放心。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46851.zh-Hant:
<voice 04802_00046851><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>我老媽在梅倫水車鄉當水車管理員，
就在出了村子後的西北方。
她一個人在那邊我不太放心。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46852.en:
<voice 04907_00046852><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>Do you think you could pick her up for me?
I have my hands full with things here, so I
can't do it myself.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46852.ja:
<voice 04907_00046852><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「村のことで手いっぱいの　俺に代わって
　おふくろを　迎えに行ってきてほしいのよ。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46852.ko:
<voice 04907_00046852><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 마을 일로 정신이 없는 나 대신
　우리 어머니를 데리고 와 주지 않겠어?<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46852.zh-Hans:
<voice 04907_00046852><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>村里事情太多我没办法抽身，
所以希望你去替我接她回来。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46852.zh-Hant:
<voice 04907_00046852><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>村裡事情太多我沒辦法抽身，
所以希望你去替我接她回來。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46853.en:
<voice 04997_00046853><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>I apologize for so much trouble since you
just got here... But please consider
lending us a helping hand.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46853.ja:
<voice 04997_00046853><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「来て早々の　旅人さんに
　面倒をかけて申し訳ないが……
　人助けと思って　チカラを貸してくだされ。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46853.ko:
<voice 04997_00046853><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 오늘 처음 만난 여행자에게
　이런 부탁을 하려니 미안하지만……
　사람 한 명 살리는 셈 치고 도와다오.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46853.zh-Hans:
<voice 04997_00046853><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>麻烦初来乍到的访客，
我心里也有点过意不去……
不过还是请你行行好，帮我这个忙吧。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46853.zh-Hant:
<voice 04997_00046853><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>麻煩初來乍到的訪客，
我心裡也有點過意不去……
不過還是請你行行好，幫我這個忙吧。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46854.en:
<voice 05117_00046854><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>I'm going to do my rounds in the village, so
I'm trusting you to take care of her for me.
Don't worry, I'll reward you for your efforts.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46854.ja:
<voice 05117_00046854><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「じゃあ　俺も　村の見回りに行くんで
　おふくろのこと　くれぐれも　よろしく頼むべ。
　ちゃんと　お礼も用意しとくでな。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46854.ko:
<voice 05117_00046854><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 그럼 난 마을을 순찰하러 갈 테니
　어머니를 잘 부탁한다.
　사례도 꼭 준비해 두마.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46854.zh-Hans:
<voice 05117_00046854><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>那我也去村里巡逻，
老妈的事情就拜托你了。
我会准备谢礼的。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46854.zh-Hant:
<voice 05117_00046854><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>那我也去村裡巡邏，
老媽的事情就拜託你了。
我會準備謝禮的。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46855.en: <voice 00375_00046855><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Raska, I found yooou~<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46855.ja: <voice 00375_00046855><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「ラスカ　みいつけた。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46855.ko: <voice 00375_00046855><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 라스카, 찾았다.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46855.zh-Hans: <voice 00375_00046855><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>找到你了，拉斯卡。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46855.zh-Hant: <voice 00375_00046855><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>找到你了，拉斯卡。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46856.en: <voice 00490_00046856><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>I thought I'd find you here, eh, Raska...<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46856.ja:
<voice 00490_00046856><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「ここに　いるんじゃないかと思ったの。
　ねえ　ラスカ……。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46856.ko:
<voice 00490_00046856><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 여기 있을 줄 알았어.
　있잖아, 라스카…….<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46856.zh-Hans:
<voice 00490_00046856><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我就猜你会来这里。
拉斯卡，你听我说……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46856.zh-Hant:
<voice 00490_00046856><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我就猜你會來到這裡。
拉斯卡，你聽我說……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46857.en: <voice 00650_00046857><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Why are you here? What do you care? *sniff*...<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46857.ja:
<voice 00650_00046857><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「なんだよ　ミシュアねえちゃんには
　カンケーねえだろ……ぐすっ。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46857.ko:
<voice 00650_00046857><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 뭐야, 미슈아 누나하고는
　상관없는 일이잖아…… 훌쩍.<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46857.zh-Hans:
<voice 00650_00046857><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>干嘛？这件事跟米修娅姐姐你
一点关系都没有……呜。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46857.zh-Hant:
<voice 00650_00046857><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>幹嘛啦，這件事
跟蜜雪雅姊姊妳無關吧……嗚。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46858.en:
<voice 00880_00046858><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Even if the wheat withers, the water
evaporates, and your tears run dry...<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46858.ja:
<voice 00880_00046858><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「たとえ　すべての麦が倒れ
　水が干上がり　涙が枯れても……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46858.ko:
<voice 00880_00046858><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 설령 모든 밀이 쓰러지고
　물이 바닥나고 눈물이 말라붙어도……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46858.zh-Hans:
<voice 00880_00046858><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>就算所有麦子都倒下来，
水源和泪水全都枯竭了……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46858.zh-Hant:
<voice 00880_00046858><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>就算所有麥子都倒下來，
水源和淚水全都枯竭了……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46859.en: <voice 00930_00046859><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Hope will remain if your voice stays true.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46859.ja:
<voice 00930_00046859><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「お前の声が　かれない限り
　救いは　必ず訪れる。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46859.ko:
<voice 00930_00046859><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 너의 목소리가 마르지 않는 한
　구원은 반드시 찾아온다.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46859.zh-Hans:
<voice 00930_00046859><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>只要你还能发出声音，
就一定会得救。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46859.zh-Hant:
<voice 00930_00046859><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>只要你還能發出聲音，
就一定會得救。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46860.en: <voice 01020_00046860><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>...I will surely be there.<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46860.ja: <voice 01020_00046860><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「……俺は　必ず駆けつける。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46860.ko: <voice 01020_00046860><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: ……난 반드시 달려올 거다.<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46860.zh-Hans: <voice 01020_00046860><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>……我一定会赶来的。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46860.zh-Hant: <voice 01020_00046860><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>……我一定會趕來的。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46861.en:
<voice 01615_00046861><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Big Sis, where did you learn that? That's Zankrone's
signature phrase!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46861.ja:
<voice 01615_00046861><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「ねえちゃん　いつの間に覚えたの？
　ザンクローネ様の決めゼリフ！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46861.ko:
<voice 01615_00046861><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 누나, 언제 외운 거야?
　장크로네 님의 명대사!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46861.zh-Hans:
<voice 01615_00046861><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>姐姐，你是什么时候背下来的？
那是赞库罗尼大人的招牌台词！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46861.zh-Hant:
<voice 01615_00046861><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>姊姊，妳是什麼時候背起來的？
那是桑克朗大人的招牌台詞！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46862.en:
<voice 01775_00046862><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Raska, you've told me the story so many times that
I memorized it.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46862.ja:
<voice 01775_00046862><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「ラスカから　たくさん
　お話を聞いたから　覚えちゃったわ。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46862.ko:
<voice 01775_00046862><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 라스카한테
　하도 많이 들어서 다 외웠어.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46862.zh-Hans:
<voice 01775_00046862><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>你讲了那么多赞库罗尼大人的
故事给我听，不知不觉就记住了。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46862.zh-Hant:
<voice 01775_00046862><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>聽你說了那麼多桑克朗大人的故事，
不知不覺就記住了。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46863.en:
<voice 01975_00046863><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>But... Dad said that he's gone... And he
won't ever come to save the day again...<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46863.ja:
<voice 01975_00046863><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「でも　とーちゃんは　あいつは死んだんだって
　もう　助けにこないって言うんだ……。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46863.ko:
<voice 01975_00046863><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 하지만 아빠는 장크로네 님은 이미
　죽었으니 구하러 오지 않을 거랬어…….<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46863.zh-Hans:
<voice 01975_00046863><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>可是爸爸说他已经死了，
不会再来救我们了……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46863.zh-Hant:
<voice 01975_00046863><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>可是爸爸說他已經死了，
不會再來救我們了……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46864.en: <voice 02265_00046864><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Heroes never die.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46864.ja: <voice 02265_00046864><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「英雄は　死なないわ。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46864.ko: <voice 02265_00046864><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 영웅은 죽지 않아.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46864.zh-Hans: <voice 02265_00046864><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>英雄是不会死的。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46864.zh-Hant: <voice 02265_00046864><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>英雄是不會死的。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46865.en:
<voice 02363_00046865><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>As long as there is just one person who believes
strongly enough...<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46865.ja:
<voice 02363_00046865><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「信じて　待っていてくれる人が
　ひとりでもいる限り……。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46865.ko:
<voice 02363_00046865><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 믿고 기다려 주는 사람이
　한 명이라도 있는 한…….<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46865.zh-Hans:
<voice 02363_00046865><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>只要还有一个
相信并等待着他的人在……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46865.zh-Hant:
<voice 02363_00046865><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>只要還有一個
相信並等待著他的人在……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46866.en:
<voice 02513_00046866><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Somebody told me that before I came
here to this village...<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46866.ja:
<voice 02513_00046866><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「村に来る前に　誰かから
　……そう　聞いた気がするの。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46866.ko:
<voice 02513_00046866><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 이 마을에 오기 전에 누군가에게
　……그런 말을 들었던 것 같아.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46866.zh-Hans:
<voice 02513_00046866><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>在来到这个村子以前，
似乎有人……对我这么说过。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46866.zh-Hant:
<voice 02513_00046866><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>在來到這個村子以前，
似乎有人……對我這麼說過。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46868.en:
<voice 02728_00046868><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Yes. But it's your father's job to protect
everyone in the village. That's why he's
being cautious.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46868.ja:
<voice 02728_00046868><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「ええ。でもね　ガッシュのおじさまは
　村に住む　みんなを　守らなきゃいけない……。
　だから　とても慎重になっているの。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46868.ko:
<voice 02728_00046868><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 응, 하지만 갓슈 아저씨는
　마을 사람들을 지켜야 하니까…….
　그래서 조심스러우신 것뿐이야.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46868.zh-Hans:
<voice 02728_00046868><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>嗯。但是加修叔叔
有责任保护村子里的人……
所以他做事很谨慎。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46868.zh-Hant:
<voice 02728_00046868><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>嗯。但是賈修叔叔
有責任保護村子裡的人……
所以他必須很謹慎看待事情。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46869.en: <voice 02788_00046869><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>You can understand his feelings, right?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46869.ja:
<voice 02788_00046869><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「お父さんの気持ちも
　ラスカは　わかってあげられるよね？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46869.ko:
<voice 02788_00046869><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 아저씨의 마음
　라스카는 이해하지?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46869.zh-Hans:
<voice 02788_00046869><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>你应该可以体会
爸爸的心情吧？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46869.zh-Hant:
<voice 02788_00046869><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>你應該可以體會
你爸爸的心情吧？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46871.en:
<voice 02918_00046871><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>...Good boy. As long as you keep your hope
alive, I'm certain Zankrone
will be just fine.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46871.ja:
<voice 02918_00046871><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「……いい子ね。
　あなたが　希望を持ち続ける限り
　ザンクローネ様は　きっと大丈夫。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46871.ko:
<voice 02918_00046871><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: ……라스카는 참 착하네.
　네가 희망을 잃지 않는 한
　장크로네 님은 괜찮을 거야.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46871.zh-Hans:
<voice 02918_00046871><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>……乖孩子，
只要你心怀希望，
赞库罗尼大人就一定会平安无事。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46871.zh-Hant:
<voice 02918_00046871><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>……乖孩子，
只要你持續懷抱著希望，
桑克朗大人一定會平安無事的。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000460.en: <voice 02919_29000460><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>...He'll be back. Big Sis Mishua, thanks.<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000460.ja:
<voice 02919_29000460><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「……帰る。
　ミシュアねえちゃん　ありがとう。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000460.ko:
<voice 02919_29000460><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: ……나, 돌아갈래.
　미슈아 누나, 고마워.<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000460.zh-Hans:
<voice 02919_29000460><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>……我要回去了。
米修娅姐姐，谢谢你。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000460.zh-Hant:
<voice 02919_29000460><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>……我要回去了。
蜜雪雅姊姊，謝謝妳。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000461.en:
<voice 02920_29000461><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Apologize properly to your father. Say you're sorry
for making him worry.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000461.ja:
<voice 02920_29000461><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「お父さんに　ちゃんと　あやまるのよ。
　心配かけて　ごめんなさいって。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000461.ko:
<voice 02920_29000461><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 아저씨한테 꼭 사과하기야?
　걱정 끼쳐서 죄송하다고.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000461.zh-Hans:
<voice 02920_29000461><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>要好好跟爸爸道歉哦，
跟他说让他担心了，对不起。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000461.zh-Hant:
<voice 02920_29000461><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>要好好跟爸爸道歉喔，
跟他說讓他擔心了，對不起。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000462.en: <voice 02969_29000462><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Ah, you're the travelers from before...?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000462.ja:
<voice 02969_29000462><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「あら　あなた方は
　先ほどの　旅人さん……？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000462.ko:
<voice 02969_29000462><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 어머, 여러분은
　아까 만난 여행자님……?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000462.zh-Hans:
<voice 02969_29000462><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>哎呀，你们是
刚才的旅行者……？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000462.zh-Hant:
<voice 02969_29000462><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>哎呀，你們是
剛剛的旅人……？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000463.en:
<voice 02970_29000463><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Uncle asked you to go to the watermill?
To check on Grandma Kope?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000463.ja:
<voice 02970_29000463><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「おじさまの頼みで　水車小屋へ？
　コペおばあさまを　お迎えにですか？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000463.ko:
<voice 02970_29000463><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 아저씨의 부탁으로 물레방앗간에요?
　코페 할머니를 모시러요?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000463.zh-Hans:
<voice 02970_29000463><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>你受叔叔之托，要去水车小屋？
是要去迎接科佩婆婆吗？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000463.zh-Hant:
<voice 02970_29000463><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>你受叔叔之託，要去水車小屋？
是要去迎接科佩婆婆嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000464.en:
<voice 02971_29000464><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Hmm... I understand. I'll go too.
Grandma definitely won't want to leave
there, I think.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000464.ja:
<voice 02971_29000464><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「うーん……わかりました。私も同行します。
　おばあさまは　きっと
　あそこを離れたがらないと　思うんです。　<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000464.ko:
<voice 02971_29000464><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 음…… 알겠어요. 저도 같이 갈게요.
　할머니는 아마
　거길 떠나려 하시지 않을 거예요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000464.zh-Hans:
<voice 02971_29000464><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>嗯……我知道了，我也一起同行。
我想婆婆一定
不想离开那边。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000464.zh-Hant:
<voice 02971_29000464><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>嗯……我知道了，我也一起同行。
我想婆婆一定不想離開那邊。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000465.en:
<voice 02972_29000465><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Much less with only a stranger; I'll put in a good
word for you.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000465.ja:
<voice 02972_29000465><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「見知らぬ　旅人さんだけが
　お迎えに行ったら　なおさらに。
　私が　口添えいたします。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000465.ko:
<voice 02972_29000465><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 낯선 여행자가
　모시러 가면 더더욱요.
　제가 설득하는 걸 도와드릴게요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000465.zh-Hans:
<voice 02972_29000465><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>只有一群不认识的旅行者
去接她的话，她就会更不想离开。
我会帮忙说服她的。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000465.zh-Hant:
<voice 02972_29000465><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>只有一群不認識的旅人
去接她的話，她就會更不想離開。
我會幫忙說服她的。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000466.en: Mishua has, graciously, joined the party!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
29000466.ja:
ミシュアが
親切にも　パーティに加わった。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
29000466.ko:
친절하게도 미슈아가
파티에 합류했다.<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
29000466.zh-Hans:
米修娅很体贴，
加入了队伍。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
29000466.zh-Hant:
蜜雪雅很體貼，
加入了隊伍。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>

46873.en:
<voice 00010_00046873><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Platinum, silver, and gold! ♪
An amazing sight, even when you're old! ♪<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46873.ja:
<voice 00010_00046873><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「ハアー　金　銀　ぷらちな
　ザックラホイ♪
　人生金色　ヨヨイノヨイ♪<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46873.ko:
<voice 00010_00046873><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 하아~ 금, 은, 플래티넘
　우수수 와르르♪
　인생은 황금빛, 좋구나 좋아♪<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46873.zh-Hans:
<voice 00010_00046873><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>哈！金子、银子和白金，
统统丢进仓库里♪
我的人生是金色的，呦呦咿呀呦♪<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46873.zh-Hant:
<voice 00010_00046873><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>哈！金子、銀子和白金，
統統丟進倉庫裡♪
我的人生是金色的，呦呦咿呀呦♪<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46874.en:
<voice 00055_00046874><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>You there! Ya' got some nerve comin'
in my place without knockin', kiddo!<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46874.ja:
<voice 00055_00046874><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「ちょいこら　そこの若僧！
　ノックもなしに　うちの敷居をまたぐたあ
　いい度胸してるね！<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46874.ko:
<voice 00055_00046874><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 이봐! 거기, 애송이!
　노크도 없이 우리 집 문턱을 넘다니
　배짱도 좋구나!<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46874.zh-Hans:
<voice 00055_00046874><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>喂！那边那个小鬼！
连门都不敲就踏进我家的门槛，
胆子不小啊！<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46874.zh-Hant:
<voice 00055_00046874><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>喂！那邊那個小鬼！
連門都不敲就踏進我家的門檻，
膽子不小啊！<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46875.en:
<voice 00085_00046875><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>I'm the waterwheel's caretaker, Kope. If ya'
wanna grind flour, ya' gotta pay the fee.
Money spins the mill, ya' know.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46875.ja:
<voice 00085_00046875><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「あたしは　この水車の管理人　コペだよ。
　粉が引きたきゃ　使用料払いな。
　金がなけりゃ　水車は回せんわな。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46875.ko:
<voice 00085_00046875><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 난 이 물레방아를 관리하는 코페다.
　밀을 빻고 싶거든 돈을 내.
　돈이 없으면 물레방아는 못 돌려 준다.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46875.zh-Hans:
<voice 00085_00046875><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>我是这座水车的管理员，科佩。
想磨粉就付钱。
没有钱，水车就不会转。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46875.zh-Hant:
<voice 00085_00046875><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>我是這座水車的管理員，科佩。
想磨粉就付錢。
沒有錢，水車就不會轉。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46876.en:
<voice 00155_00046876><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>......Aah? Ya' came ta' get me because I'm in danger?
...There's a monster out there?<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46876.ja:
<voice 00155_00046876><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「…………アァン？
　化けモンが出て　危険だから
　……あたしを　迎えにきた？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46876.ko:
<voice 00155_00046876><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: …………으응?
　괴물이 나와서 위험하니
　……날 데리러 왔다고?<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46876.zh-Hans:
<voice 00155_00046876><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>…………啊？
你说这附近有怪物出没很危险……
所以来接我？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46876.zh-Hant:
<voice 00155_00046876><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>…………啊？
你說這附近有怪物出沒很危險……
所以來接我？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46877.en:
<voice 00195_00046877><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Bah! Don't get smart with me, ya' little punk!
I like it here. How can ya' take me back to
the village just like that?<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46877.ja:
<voice 00195_00046877><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「ハン！　ぬかすんじゃないよ　若ヒョットコ！
　あたしゃ　ここが気に入ってんのさ。
　そう　やすやすと　村に帰れるかい。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46877.ko:
<voice 00195_00046877><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 흥! 어림없는 소리 마라, 애송이!
　난 여기가 좋아.
　그리 쉽게 마을로 돌아갈 것 같으냐?<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46877.zh-Hans:
<voice 00195_00046877><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>哼！别胡扯了，小骗子！
我很喜欢这个地方，
才不会轻易回村子。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46877.zh-Hant:
<voice 00195_00046877><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>哼！別胡扯了，小騙子！
我很喜歡這個地方，
才不會輕易回村子。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46878.en:
<voice 00225_00046878><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>I don't care if it's a monster or a
cinnamon bun. I ain't so soft that it's gonna
get me!<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46878.ja:
<voice 00225_00046878><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「化けモンだか　シナモンだか知らないけど
　そんなのに　やられるほど
　あたしゃ　やわじゃないよ。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46878.ko:
<voice 00225_00046878><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 괴물인지 요물인지 모르겠지만
　난 그런 녀석한테 당할 만큼
　만만한 사람이 아니라고.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46878.zh-Hans:
<voice 00225_00046878><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>管他怪物还是谷物，
我可没弱到会被
那种东西干掉。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46878.zh-Hant:
<voice 00225_00046878><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>管他怪物還是穀物，
我可沒弱到會被
那種東西幹掉。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46879.en:
<voice 00255_00046879><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>...How can that no good son o' mine send a
youngin' here without showing his own face
himself?<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46879.ja:
<voice 00255_00046879><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「……まったく　あのトンカチ息子は
　ろくに　顔も見せずに
　こんな若いのを　寄こすなんてね。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46879.ko:
<voice 00255_00046879><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: ……나 원, 그 똥고집 아들놈은
　얼굴 한 번 안 비추더니
　어디서 이런 애송이를 보내고 있어.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46879.zh-Hans:
<voice 00255_00046879><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>……真是的，那个笨蛋儿子
居然亲自来一趟都不肯，
派这么一个年轻人过来。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46879.zh-Hant:
<voice 00255_00046879><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>……真是的，那個笨蛋兒子
居然親自來一趟都不肯，
派這麼一個年輕人過來。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000467.en:
<voice 00256_29000467><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Your son said to apologize for not being here himself,
Grandma.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000467.ja:
<voice 00256_29000467><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「息子じゃなくって　ごめんなさい
　コペおばあさま。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000467.ko:
<voice 00256_29000467><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 아드님이 아니라 죄송해요.
　코페 할머니.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000467.zh-Hans:
<voice 00256_29000467><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>不是儿子，对不起，
科佩婆婆。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000467.zh-Hant:
<voice 00256_29000467><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>不是兒子，對不起，
科佩婆婆。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000468.en: <voice 00257_29000468><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>If it isn't the runaway. You came here too?<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000468.ja:
<voice 00257_29000468><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「なんだい　家出娘。
　あんたも　来てたのかい？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000468.ko:
<voice 00257_29000468><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 뭐냐, 가출 소녀.
　너도 왔느냐?<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000468.zh-Hans:
<voice 00257_29000468><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>离家出走的姑娘，干嘛？
你也来啦？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000468.zh-Hant:
<voice 00257_29000468><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>離家出走的姑娘，幹嘛？
妳也來啦？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000469.en:
<voice 00258_29000469><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Grandma, I wanted to see you again.
Plus, these travelers were asked to
bring you along.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000469.ja:
<voice 00258_29000469><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「おばあさまに　また　会いたくなって。
　旅人さんに　無理を言って
　連れてきて　もらっちゃいました。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000469.ko:
<voice 00258_29000469><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 할머니가 또 보고 싶어져서요.
　여행자님께 떼를 써서
　같이 따라왔어요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000469.zh-Hans:
<voice 00258_29000469><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我想再跟婆婆见面，
所以硬是拜托旅行者，
请他带我过来。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000469.zh-Hant:
<voice 00258_29000469><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我想再跟婆婆見面，
所以硬是拜託旅行者，
請他帶我過來。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000470.en:
<voice 00259_29000470><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>...Say, Grandma Kope, lately the
monsters that have been appearing have
been really scary.
Uncle Gash is worried.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000470.ja:
<voice 00259_29000470><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「……ねえ　コペおばあさま。
　近頃　出没する化け物は　本当に恐ろしくて
　ガッシュのおじさまも　心を痛めておられるの。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000470.ko:
<voice 00259_29000470><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: ……있잖아요, 코페 할머니.
　요새 나타나는 괴물은 정말 무시무시해서
　갓슈 아저씨도 많이 걱정하고 계세요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000470.zh-Hans:
<voice 00259_29000470><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>……哎，科佩婆婆，
最近出没的怪物真的很恐怖，
加修叔叔也很忧虑。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000470.zh-Hant:
<voice 00259_29000470><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>……欸，科佩婆婆，
最近出沒的怪物真的很恐怖，
賈修叔叔也很憂慮。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000471.en:
<voice 00260_29000471><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>I've been worried about you too...
Would you mind coming back to the
village with us.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000471.ja:
<voice 00260_29000471><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「私も　おばあさまが心配よ……。
　どうか　一緒に　村へ帰りましょう。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000471.ko:
<voice 00260_29000471><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 저도 할머니가 걱정되고요…….
　부탁이니 함께 마을로 돌아가요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000471.zh-Hans:
<voice 00260_29000471><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我也很担心婆婆……
我们一起回村子吧。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000471.zh-Hant:
<voice 00260_29000471><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我也很擔心婆婆……
我們一起回村子吧。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000472.en:
<voice 00261_29000472><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>How foolish. You're another spy from my
dumb-as-a-bag-of-hammers son too.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000472.ja:
<voice 00261_29000472><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「なんだい　つまらないね。
　あんたも　トンカチ息子の
　回しモンってことかい。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000472.ko:
<voice 00261_29000472><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 뭐냐, 시답잖기는.
　너도 똥고집 아들놈이
　보내서 온 게냐?<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000472.zh-Hans:
<voice 00261_29000472><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>什么啊？真无聊。
你也是我那笨蛋儿子派来的
家伙吗？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000472.zh-Hant:
<voice 00261_29000472><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>什麼啊？有夠無聊。
妳也是笨蛋兒子派來的傢伙嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000473.en:
<voice 00262_29000473><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Fuh! If he's that worried, why isn't
Gash here to meet me himself.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000473.ja:
<voice 00262_29000473><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「フン！　だいたい心配なら
　ガッシュが　自分で迎えにくりゃ
　いいじゃないのさ。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000473.ko:
<voice 00262_29000473><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 흥! 애초에 그리 어미가 걱정되면
　갓슈가 직접 데리러 오면
　될 것 아니냐.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000473.zh-Hans:
<voice 00262_29000473><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>哼！如果真的担心，
应该是加修自己过来
接我吧。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000473.zh-Hant:
<voice 00262_29000473><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>哼！如果真的擔心，
應該是賈修自己過來
接我吧。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000474.en:
<voice 00263_29000474><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Always busy with the village and no
time for anyone else.
Such an ungrateful person I raised.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000474.ja:
<voice 00263_29000474><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「いつもいつも　村のことばかりで
　ちっとも　かまってくれないしさ。
　あんな親不孝者に　育てたおぼえはないね。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000474.ko:
<voice 00263_29000474><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 맨날 마을 일만 챙기느라
　제 어미는 들여다보지도 않고.
　난 그런 불효 자식으로 키운 적 없다.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000474.zh-Hans:
<voice 00263_29000474><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>他总是只想着村子，
完全不关心我。
我可不记得养过这种不孝子。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000474.zh-Hant:
<voice 00263_29000474><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>他總是只想著村子，
完全都不顧慮我。
我可不記得有養過這種不孝子。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000475.en:
<voice 00264_29000475><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Oh, by the way Grandma, Raska was eager to see you
too.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000475.ja:
<voice 00264_29000475><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「あらあら。でもね　おばあさま。
　ラスカは　とっても
　会いたがっていましたよ？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000475.ko:
<voice 00264_29000475><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 아이참. 하지만, 할머니.
　라스카는 할머니를
　엄청나게 보고 싶어 하던걸요?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000475.zh-Hans:
<voice 00264_29000475><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>哎呀呀，可是，婆婆，
拉斯卡非常
想见你哦。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000475.zh-Hant:
<voice 00264_29000475><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>哎呀呀，可是，婆婆，
拉斯卡非常想見妳喔。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000476.ja: <voice 00265_29000476><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「…………本当かい？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000477.en:
<voice 00266_29000477><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Yes! He can't wait to hear more stories
of Zankrone you have to tell.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000477.ja:
<voice 00266_29000477><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「ええ！　おばあさまに
　ザンクローネ様が　大活躍した昔話を
　いっぱい　教えてもらうんだって。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000477.ko:
<voice 00266_29000477><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 네! 할머니께
　장크로네 님이 대활약한 옛날이야기를
　잔뜩 들려달라고 할 거랬어요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000477.zh-Hans:
<voice 00266_29000477><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>是啊！他说要请婆婆
告诉他赞库罗尼大人以前
大展身手的各种故事。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000477.zh-Hant:
<voice 00266_29000477><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>是啊！他說要請婆婆
告訴他桑克朗大人以前
大展身手的各種故事。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000478.en: <voice 00267_29000478><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Is that so... That Raska...<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000478.ja:
<voice 00267_29000478><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「そうかい……。
　ラスカが　そんなことを……。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000478.ko:
<voice 00267_29000478><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 그래…….
　라스카가 그런 얘기를…….<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000478.zh-Hans:
<voice 00267_29000478><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>这样啊……
拉斯卡这么说啊……<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000478.zh-Hant:
<voice 00267_29000478><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>這樣啊……
拉斯卡這麼說啊……<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000479.en: <voice 00268_29000479><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Fuh! That has nothing to do with this.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000479.ja: <voice 00268_29000479><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「フン！　あたしにゃ関係ないけどね。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000479.ko: <voice 00268_29000479><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 흥! 내 알 바는 아니지만.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000479.zh-Hans: <voice 00268_29000479><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>哼！但这跟我无关。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000479.zh-Hant: <voice 00268_29000479><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>哼！但這跟我無關。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000480.en:
<voice 00269_29000480><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Ooh!... Now that you mention it, I intended
to go back and pick up money I had set aside.
<auto_br=3500>
Can't be helped, I suppose, I'll have to
go back for a little while, won't I.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000480.ja:
<voice 00269_29000480><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「おお！　……そういえば　ほったらかしだった
　ヘソクリを　取りにいこうと思ってたんだ！
　しーかたないねえ　ちょこっと帰るかねえ。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000480.ko:
<voice 00269_29000480><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 참! ……그러고 보니 내버려둔
　비상금을 가지러 가려고 했었지!
　하는 수 없지, 잠깐 돌아가기로 할까.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000480.zh-Hans:
<voice 00269_29000480><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>哦哦！……对了，我一直想去拿
被我放着的私房钱！
没办法，稍微回去一下吧。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000480.zh-Hant:
<voice 00269_29000480><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>喔喔！……對了，我一直想去拿
被我放著的私房錢！
沒辦法，稍微回去一下吧。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000481.en:
<voice 00270_29000481><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>...That's it! While I'm packing my bags, I've got
something for you all to do.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000481.ja:
<voice 00270_29000481><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「……そうだ！　あたしが荷物をまとめてる間に
　あんたたち　ひと仕事　頼まれておくれ。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000481.ko:
<voice 00270_29000481><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: ……그렇지! 내가 짐을 쌀 동안
　너희는 일을 하나 해 다오.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000481.zh-Hans:
<voice 00270_29000481><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>……对了！在我整理行李期间，
我有个工作要拜托你们。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000481.zh-Hant:
<voice 00270_29000481><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>……對了！在我整理行李的期間，
我有個工作要拜託你們。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000482.en:
<voice 00271_29000482><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Lately, the waterwheel has been acting up.
Probably just something caught in the gears.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000482.ja:
<voice 00271_29000482><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「最近　水車の回りが悪くてさ。
　たぶん　歯車に　何か　はさまってんだわな。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000482.ko:
<voice 00271_29000482><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 요새 물레방아 돌아가는 게
　영 시원치 않아서 말이다.
　아마 톱니바퀴에 뭐가 낀 모양이야.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000482.zh-Hans:
<voice 00271_29000482><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>最近水车转得很不顺，
大概是齿轮夹到什么东西了。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000482.zh-Hant:
<voice 00271_29000482><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>最近水車轉動得很不順，
大概是齒輪夾到什麼東西了。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000483.en:
<voice 00272_29000483><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>I can't leave here with that as it is, y'know. With
the waterwheel completely busted.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000483.ja:
<voice 00272_29000483><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「あれを　ほっといたまま
　ここを離れるわけには　いかないねぇ。
　ほっといたら　水車が壊れちまう。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000483.ko:
<voice 00272_29000483><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 물레방아를 그냥 놔둔 채
　여길 떠날 수는 없어.
　그대로 두면 물레방아가 망가질 게다.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000483.zh-Hans:
<voice 00272_29000483><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>我不能放着这个问题，
自己离开这里。
不处理的话，水车会坏掉。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000483.zh-Hant:
<voice 00272_29000483><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>我不能放著這個問題，
自己離開這裡。
不處理的話，水車會壞掉。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000484.en:
<voice 00273_29000484><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Here's the key to open the watermill, so
you can fix the problem real quick.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000484.ja:
<voice 00273_29000484><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「水車小屋のカギは　開けてあるから 
　ちょっくら　直してきておくれ。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000484.ko:
<voice 00273_29000484><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 물레방앗간은 열어 놨으니 
　잠깐 가서 고쳐 다오.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000484.zh-Hans:
<voice 00273_29000484><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>我会打开水车小屋的锁，
你们去修理一下吧。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000484.zh-Hant:
<voice 00273_29000484><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>我會打開水車小屋的鎖，
你們去修理一下吧。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000485.en: <voice 00274_29000485><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Alright, get going. 'Time is gold', y'know!<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000485.ja:
<voice 00274_29000485><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「さあ　とっとと行きな。
