　たいむ　いず　ごーるど！　だよ！<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000485.ko:
<voice 00274_29000485><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 자, 어서 가거라.
　시간은 금이라지 않느냐!<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000485.zh-Hans:
<voice 00274_29000485><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>好了，赶快去吧。
时间就是金币！快去！<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000485.zh-Hant:
<voice 00274_29000485><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>好了，趕快去吧。
時間就是金幣！快去！<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000486.ja: <voice 00275_29000486><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「はい　おばあさま！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000486.ko: <voice 00275_29000486><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 네, 할머니!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000486.zh-Hans: <voice 00275_29000486><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>好的，婆婆！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000486.zh-Hant: <voice 00275_29000486><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>好的，婆婆！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000487.en: <voice 00276_29000487><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001><pc>, together, let's do our best!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000487.ja:
<voice 00276_29000487><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん
　一緒に　がんばりましょうね！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000487.ko: <voice 00276_29000487><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨, 함께 힘내요!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000487.zh-Hans:
<voice 00276_29000487><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001><pc>，
我们一起加油吧！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000487.zh-Hant:
<voice 00276_29000487><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001><pc>，
我們一起加油吧！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000488.en:
<voice 00277_29000488><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>If we take care of that task, I think
Grandma will gladly return to the village.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000488.ja:
<voice 00277_29000488><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「この　お手伝いが終われば
　おばあさまも　気持ちよく
　村へ　帰ってくださると思うの。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000488.ko:
<voice 00277_29000488><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 이 일만 도와드리면
　할머니도 흔쾌히
　마을로 돌아가실 거예요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000488.zh-Hans:
<voice 00277_29000488><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我想只要帮忙把这件事做好，
婆婆应该也会
带着好心情回村子。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000488.zh-Hant:
<voice 00277_29000488><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我想只要幫忙把這件事做好，
婆婆應該也會帶著好心情回村子。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000489.en: <voice 00278_29000489><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>You'll help out, won't you?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000489.ja:
<voice 00278_29000489><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「おチカラを
　貸していただけませんか？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000489.ko: <voice 00278_29000489><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 힘을 빌려주시지 않겠어요?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000489.zh-Hans:
<voice 00278_29000489><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>可以请您
协助我吗？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000489.zh-Hant:
<voice 00278_29000489><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>可以請您
協助我嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46884.en: <voice 00045_00046884><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>Naw, Berti! Jam it in there!<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46884.ja:
<voice 00045_00046884>「いやーん　バーティ
　そっち押し込んでぇ！
46884.ko:
<voice 00045_00046884>: 아앙~ 버티
　그쪽 꽉 밀어 넣어!
46884.zh-Hans:
<voice 00045_00046884>讨厌啦，巴迪，
你用力一点啊！
46884.zh-Hant:
<voice 00045_00046884>討厭啦，巴迪，
你用力一點啊！

46885.en: <voice 00125_00046885><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>Almost there, Jamii! Just a little more...!<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46885.ja:
<voice 00125_00046885>「まかせて　ジャーミィ
　あと　ひといきよ～！
46885.ko:
<voice 00125_00046885>: 나만 믿어, 재미!
　이제 얼마 안 남았어~!
46885.zh-Hans:
<voice 00125_00046885>交给我吧，伽密，
就差一点了！
46885.zh-Hant:
<voice 00125_00046885>交給我吧，加米，
就差一點了！

46887.en:
<voice 00365_00046887><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>Whew! It sure is hard to jam this thing into the
gears!<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46887.ja:
<voice 00365_00046887>「ふう　しびれくらげを
　水車の歯車に　はさむ仕事は
　骨が折れるわねぇ。
46887.ko:
<voice 00365_00046887>: 후우, 물레방아 톱니바퀴 사이에
　저릿해파리 끼워 넣는 거
　진짜 너무 힘들다.
46887.zh-Hans:
<voice 00365_00046887>把麻痹水母塞进
水车齿轮里的工作，
还真是累人啊。
46887.zh-Hant:
<voice 00365_00046887>把麻痺水母塞進
水車齒輪裡的工作，
還真是累人啊。

46888.en: <voice 00435_00046888><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>But it sure is fun～ Makes you feel alive～<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46888.ja:
<voice 00435_00046888>「でも　楽しいわ～。
　生きがいを感じるわ～。
46888.zh-Hans:
<voice 00435_00046888>不过这工作真有趣～～
让我感受到自己的存在价值～～
46888.zh-Hant:
<voice 00435_00046888>不過這工作真有趣～～
讓我感受到自己的存在價值～～

46889.en: <voice 00495_00046889><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>Think of all the praise we're gonna get...<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46889.ja:
<voice 00495_00046889>「あの方に　たっぷり
　ほめてもらわなきゃねぇ。
46889.zh-Hans:
<voice 00495_00046889>一定要让那位大人
好好夸我。
46889.zh-Hant:
<voice 00495_00046889>一定要讓那位大人
好好誇我。

46890.en: <voice 00575_00046890><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>Uh oh! Somebody's spotted us!<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46890.ja:
<voice 00575_00046890>「あららん？　誰かに
　見られちゃった～。
46890.zh-Hans:
<voice 00575_00046890>哎呀呀？我们
被人发现了～～
46890.zh-Hant:
<voice 00575_00046890>哎呀呀？我們
被人發現了～～

46891.en:
<voice 00630_00046891><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>Yuh oh! This is bad! We can't let anyone
find out!<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46891.ja:
<voice 00630_00046891>「おややん？　まずいわぁ。
　まだ　見つかっちゃダメって　言われてたのに。
46891.ko:
<voice 00630_00046891>: 뭐야야? 큰일이네.
　아직 들키면 안 된다고 했는데.
46891.zh-Hans:
<voice 00630_00046891>哎哟哟？不好啦！
我们被交代过不能被发现。
46891.zh-Hant:
<voice 00630_00046891>哎喲喲？不好啦！
我們被交代過不能被發現。

46892.en:
<voice 00690_00046892><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>We'll let you off the hook today! Let's
skedaddle!<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46892.ja:
<voice 00690_00046892>「今日のところは
　逃げるが　カチカチパンよ～。
46892.zh-Hans:
<voice 00690_00046892>今天就撤退吧，
逃命才是硬道理～
46892.zh-Hant:
<voice 00690_00046892>今天就撤退吧，
硬硬麵包～～

46893.ja: <voice 00915_00046893><start_lip_sync m01599 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「キュ～　キュ～。<stop_lip_animation m01599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46893.ko: <voice 00915_00046893><start_lip_sync m01599 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 뀨우~ 뀨우~<stop_lip_animation m01599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

70592.en: The waterwheel began turning with much force!
70592.ja: 水車は　勢いよく　回り始めた！
70592.zh-Hans: 水车开始顺畅地转动了！

29000494.en: <voice 01296_29000494><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>That should take care of the waterwheel!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000494.ja: <voice 01296_29000494><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「これで　もう　水車は大丈夫ですね！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000494.ko: <voice 01296_29000494><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 이제 물레방아는 걱정 없겠어요!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000494.zh-Hans: <voice 01296_29000494><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>这样水车就没问题了！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000494.zh-Hant: <voice 01296_29000494><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>這樣水車就沒問題了！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000495.en:
<voice 01297_29000495><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>That's right! Since no one will be here for a while,
shouldn't we clean up the creek too. If something
catches in there again, it'd be bad.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000495.ja:
<voice 01297_29000495><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「そうだ！　しばらく　ここには誰も来ないし
　小川の掃除も　しておかなくっちゃ。
　また何か　はさまりでもしたら　大変。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000495.ko:
<voice 01297_29000495><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 그렇지! 한동안 이곳에는 아무도 안 올 테니
　개울 청소도 해 두는 게 좋겠어요.
　또 뭔가 끼기라도 하면 큰일이니까요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000495.zh-Hans:
<voice 01297_29000495><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>对了！这里暂时不会有人来，
得先清扫小河才行。
不然又有东西夹到就麻烦了。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000495.zh-Hant:
<voice 01297_29000495><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>對了！這裡暫時不會有人來，
得先清掃小河才行。
不然又有東西夾到就麻煩了。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000496.en:
<voice 01298_29000496><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Pardon me. May I be so bold as to ask you for help
with another thing?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000496.ja:
<voice 01298_29000496><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「すみません。
　もう　ひと頑張り　お願いできますか？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000496.ko:
<voice 01298_29000496><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 죄송해요.
　한 번만 더 도와주시면 안 될까요?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000496.zh-Hans:
<voice 01298_29000496><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>不好意思，
可以再请您帮忙一下吗？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000496.zh-Hant:
<voice 01298_29000496><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>不好意思，
可以再請您幫忙一下嗎？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000497.en: <voice 01299_29000497><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Then let's clean up this mess together!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000497.ja:
<voice 01299_29000497><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「では　一緒に
　お掃除　がんばりましょう！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000497.ko:
<voice 01299_29000497><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 그럼 같이
　열심히 청소해요!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000497.zh-Hans:
<voice 01299_29000497><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>那我们一起
努力打扫吧！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000497.zh-Hant:
<voice 01299_29000497><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>那我們一起
努力打掃吧！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000498.en: <voice 01300_29000498><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>You shouldn't say such a thing.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000498.ja: <voice 01300_29000498><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「そんなこと　言わないで。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000498.ko: <voice 01300_29000498><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 그러지 마시고요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000498.zh-Hans: <voice 01300_29000498><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>别这么说嘛。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000498.zh-Hant: <voice 01300_29000498><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>別這麼說嘛。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46921.en:
<voice 00295_00046921><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Alright, <pc>. Let's clean up this
mess.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46921.ja:
<voice 00295_00046921><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「さあ　<pc>さん。
　はりきって　お掃除しましょう。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46921.ko:
<voice 00295_00046921><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 자, <pc> 씨.
　기운 내서 열심히 청소해요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46921.zh-Hans:
<voice 00295_00046921><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>来，<pc>，
一起努力清理吧。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46921.zh-Hant:
<voice 00295_00046921><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>來，<pc>，
一起努力清理吧。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

70594.en:
<pc> and Mishua diligently cleaned
the creek!
70594.ja:
<pc>と　ミシュアは
しばらくの間　熱心に　小川を掃除した！
70594.zh-Hans:
<pc>和米修娅
用心地清理了小河！
70594.zh-Hant:
<pc>和蜜雪雅
花了一些時間，賣力地清理小河！

46922.en:
<voice 01065_00046922><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Good! It's looks nice and pretty now. You did a great
job cleaning it!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46922.ja:
<voice 01065_00046922><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「うん！　とってもキレイになったわね。
　小川のお掃除　お疲れさまでした。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46922.ko:
<voice 01065_00046922><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 좋아! 아주 말끔해졌네요.
　개울 청소하느라 고생하셨어요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46922.zh-Hans:
<voice 01065_00046922><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>嗯！小河清理得很干净，
辛苦了。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46922.zh-Hant:
<voice 01065_00046922><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>嗯！小河清理得很乾淨，
辛苦了。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46923.en:
<voice 01325_00046923><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>So I heard you came from a pretty faraway place.
Do you think Melsandy Village is a nice place, too?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46923.ja:
<voice 01325_00046923><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「<pc>さんは　ずっと
　遠い場所から　来たんですってね。
　メルサンディ村は　いい所でしょう？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46923.ko:
<voice 01325_00046923><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨는
　아주 먼 곳에서 오셨다고 했죠?
　메르상디 마을은 참 좋은 곳이죠?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46923.zh-Hans:
<voice 01325_00046923><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001><pc>，听说
你是从很远的地方来的。
梅尔桑蒂村是不是很棒啊？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46923.zh-Hant:
<voice 01325_00046923><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001><pc>，聽說
你是從很遠的地方來的。
梅爾桑蒂村是不是很棒啊？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46924.en:
<voice 01375_00046924><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>I see... I'm glad to hear that. Seeing you happy
makes me happy too.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46924.ja:
<voice 01375_00046924><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「そう……　よかった。
　自分のことみたいに　うれしいわ。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46924.ko:
<voice 01375_00046924><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 그렇군요…… 다행이에요.
　제 칭찬을 들은 것처럼 기쁘네요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46924.zh-Hans:
<voice 01375_00046924><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>是吗……那就好。
听你这么说就像是自己被夸奖一样，好开心。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46924.zh-Hant:
<voice 01375_00046924><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>是喔……那就好。
聽你這麼說就像是自己被誇獎一樣，好開心。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46925.en:
<voice 01490_00046925><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>I see... Things are pretty bad in the village right
now, with the monsters and all.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46925.ja:
<voice 01490_00046925><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「そうね……。今は　化け物が現れて
　大変なことになっているものね。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46925.ko:
<voice 01490_00046925><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 그렇죠……. 지금은 괴물이 나타나서
　마을이 어수선하니까요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46925.zh-Hans:
<voice 01490_00046925><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>也是……毕竟现在有怪物出现，
村子陷入危险。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46925.zh-Hant:
<voice 01490_00046925><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>也是啦……畢竟現在有怪物出現，
村子陷入危險。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46926.en:
<voice 01560_00046926><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>...I'm actually not from the village. I was found
collapsed in the road by the chief, and that's where
I've been staying.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46926.ja:
<voice 01560_00046926><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「……私も　あの村の人間ではないの。
　行き倒れていたところを　拾われて
　村長さんの家に　お世話になっているのよ。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46926.ko:
<voice 01560_00046926><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: ……저도 그 마을 사람은 아니에요.
　길에 쓰러져 있던 절 구해 주셔서
　촌장님 댁에서 신세를 지고 있는 거예요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46926.zh-Hans:
<voice 01560_00046926><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>……我其实不是那个村子的人。
我倒在路边的时候被村里的人救回来，
之后就住在村长家里。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46926.zh-Hant:
<voice 01560_00046926><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>……我其實不是那個村子的人。
我倒在路邊的時候被村裡的人救回來，
之後就住在村長家裡。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46928.en: <voice 01760_00046928><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>I don't remember anything before that.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46928.ja: <voice 01760_00046928><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「私には　それ以前の記憶がないの。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46928.ko: <voice 01760_00046928><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 전 그 전의 기억이 없어요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46928.zh-Hans: <voice 01760_00046928><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我没有以前的记忆。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46928.zh-Hant: <voice 01760_00046928><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我沒有以前的記憶。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46929.en:
<voice 01900_00046929><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>When I woke up, I couldn't remember
anything. I had no idea of why I was there
or what I was supposed to be doing.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46929.ja:
<voice 01900_00046929><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「目が覚めた時には　何も覚えていなかった……。
　何をしてきたか　何をしたらいいのか
　ひとつも　わからなかった。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46929.ko:
<voice 01900_00046929><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 정신이 들었을 땐 전부 기억나지 않았어요…….
　뭘 하며 살았는지, 뭘 해야 하는지
　아무것도 알 수가 없었어요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46929.zh-Hans:
<voice 01900_00046929><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>醒过来的时候，什么都不记得……
既不知道以前发生过什么，
也不知道接下来该怎么办才好。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46929.zh-Hant:
<voice 01900_00046929><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>醒過來的時候，什麼都不記得……
既不知道以前發生過什麼事，
也不知道接下來該怎麼辦才好。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46930.en:
<voice 01930_00046930><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>But the people in that village accepted me
as one of their own and let me live there.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46930.ja:
<voice 01930_00046930><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「でも　あの村の人たちは
　こんな私を　受け入れてくれたわ。
　ここで生きていけばいいと　言ってくれた。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46930.ko:
<voice 01930_00046930><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 하지만 마을 분들은
　이런 절 받아 주셨어요.
　이곳에서 살면 된다고 말씀해 주셨죠.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46930.zh-Hans:
<voice 01930_00046930><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>不过，那个村子的人
还是接受了我，
他们告诉我可以在村里生活。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46930.zh-Hant:
<voice 01930_00046930><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>不過，那個村子的人
還是接受了我，
他們告訴我可以在村裡生活。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46931.en: <voice 02165_00046931><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Raska and Uncle Gash were very nice to me...<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46931.ja:
<voice 02165_00046931><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「ラスカと　ガッシュのおじさまも
　すごく　よくしてくれて……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46931.ko:
<voice 02165_00046931><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 라스카와 갓슈 아저씨도
　정말 친절하게 대해 주셨어요……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46931.zh-Hans:
<voice 02165_00046931><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>拉斯卡和加修叔叔
也对我很好……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46931.zh-Hant:
<voice 02165_00046931><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>拉斯卡和賈修叔叔
也對我很好……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46932.en:
<voice 02230_00046932><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>"You're part of the family", he said. He gave
me this pin which has been passed down
from generation to generation in his family.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46932.ja:
<voice 02230_00046932><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「お前は　俺たちの家族だって
　村長さんの家に　代々　受け継がれてきた
　この　かみかざりをくださったの。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46932.ko:
<voice 02230_00046932><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 넌 이제 우리 가족이라면서
　촌장님 가문에 대대로 전해 내려오는
　이 머리 장식도 주셨어요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46932.zh-Hans:
<voice 02230_00046932><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>村长把我视为家人，
还将家族代代相传的发饰送给我。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46932.zh-Hant:
<voice 02230_00046932><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>村長把我視為家人，
還將家族代代相傳的髮飾送給我。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46933.en:
<voice 02460_00046933><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>I've only seen Melsandy in its current bad
state, but I love the warmth of its people.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46933.ja:
<voice 02460_00046933><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「私は　荒れ果ててしまった
　メルサンディ村しか　知らないけれど
　あたたかい　村の人たちが大好きよ。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46933.ko:
<voice 02460_00046933><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 전 황폐해진 메르상디 마을밖에 모르지만
　인정 넘치는 마을 분들이 정말 좋아요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46933.zh-Hans:
<voice 02460_00046933><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我虽然只见过梅尔桑蒂村
现在这副荒凉的景象，不过
我很喜欢那些有人情味的村民。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46933.zh-Hant:
<voice 02460_00046933><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我雖然只見過梅爾桑蒂村
現在這副荒涼的景象，不過
我很喜歡那些有人情味的村民。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46934.en: <voice 02550_00046934><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>So that's why... I decided to live there.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46934.ja:
<voice 02550_00046934><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「だから　私……
　あの村で　生きていこうって　決めたの。 <stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46934.ko:
<voice 02550_00046934><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 그래서 전……
　앞으로도 그 마을에서 살기로 결심했어요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46934.zh-Hans:
<voice 02550_00046934><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>所以我……
决定要在那个村子生活下去。 <stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46934.zh-Hant:
<voice 02550_00046934><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>所以我……
決定要在那個村子生活下去。 <stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46935.ja: <voice 02646_00046935><start_lip_sync m01599 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「キュ～　キュ～。<stop_lip_animation m01599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46935.ko: <voice 02646_00046935><start_lip_sync m01599 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 뀨우~ 뀨우~<stop_lip_animation m01599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46936.en:
<voice 02915_00046936><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Oh my, how cute! Looks like it's trying to get
your attention, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46936.ja:
<voice 02915_00046936><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「あら　かわいい！
　どうやら　<pc>さんを
　呼んでいるみたいね。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46936.ko:
<voice 02915_00046936><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 어머나, 귀여워라!
　보아하니 <pc> 씨를
　부르는 것 같아요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46936.zh-Hans:
<voice 02915_00046936><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>哎呀，真可爱！
<pc>，
好像在叫你呢。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46936.zh-Hant:
<voice 02915_00046936><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>哎呀，真可愛！
<pc>，
他好像在叫你呢。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000857.ja:
<pc>は　紅蓮の大宝石を
受け取った！<me 60>

46938.en:
<voice 03835_00046938><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>I wonder if that was meant as some kind of
present? It must've found it in the creek!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46938.ja:
<voice 03835_00046938><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「プレゼントのつもりなのかしら？ 
　きっと　川に落ちていたのを拾ったのね！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46938.ko:
<voice 03835_00046938><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 선물로 주는 건가? 
　개울에 떨어져 있던 걸 주웠나 봐요!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46938.zh-Hans:
<voice 03835_00046938><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>它是想把这个送你当礼物吗？ 
应该是从河里捡上来的！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46938.zh-Hant:
<voice 03835_00046938><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>他是想把這個送你當禮物嗎？ 
應該是從河裡撿上來的！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46939.en:
<voice 03965_00046939><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>I've got my stuff ready. How's it going
over there?<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46939.ja:
<voice 03965_00046939><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「荷物が　まとまったよ。
　そっちのほうは　どうだい？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46939.ko:
<voice 03965_00046939><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 짐은 다 쌌다.
　너희 쪽은 어떠냐?<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46939.zh-Hans:
<voice 03965_00046939><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>我收拾好行李了。
你们那边好了吗？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46939.zh-Hant:
<voice 03965_00046939><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>我收拾好行李了。
你們那邊好了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000499.en:
<voice 04075_29000499><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Grandma Kope! Thanks to the traveler,
the waterwheel has been fixed again and
the creek has become super pretty!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000499.ja:
<voice 04075_29000499><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「コペおばあさま！　旅人さんのおかげで
　水車も直ったし　ついでに　
　小川も　すごくキレイになったんですよ。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000499.ko:
<voice 04075_29000499><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 코페 할머니! 여행자님 덕분에
　물레방아도 고쳤고
　개울도 깨끗해졌어요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000499.zh-Hans:
<voice 04075_29000499><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>科佩婆婆！多亏旅行者帮忙，
水车修好了，而且还顺便
把小河弄得很干净。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000499.zh-Hant:
<voice 04075_29000499><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>科佩婆婆！多虧旅行者幫忙，
不僅水車修好了，
還順便把小河弄乾淨囉。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49082.en:
<voice 04175_00049082><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Oh, that's right! Before we go back, I have to water
the flowerbed.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49082.ja:
<voice 04175_00049082><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「そうだわ！　帰る前に　花壇のお花に
　お水を　あげておかなくちゃ。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49082.ko:
<voice 04175_00049082><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 그렇지! 돌아가기 전에
　화단의 꽃에 물을 줘야겠다.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49082.zh-Hans:
<voice 04175_00049082><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>对了！回去之前，得帮花圃的花
浇水才行。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49082.zh-Hant:
<voice 04175_00049082><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>對了！回去之前，得幫花圃的花
澆水才行。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46940.ja:
<voice 04365_00046940><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「んん？
　んんんんん？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46940.ko:
<voice 04365_00046940><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 응?
　으으으으응?<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46940.zh-Hans:
<voice 04365_00046940><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>嗯嗯？
嗯嗯嗯嗯嗯？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46940.zh-Hant:
<voice 04365_00046940><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>嗯嗯？
嗯嗯嗯嗯嗯？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46941.en:
Kope snatched the Bright Red Gem from
<pc>!
46941.ja:
<pc>は　紅蓮の大宝石を
コペに　奪われた！
46941.zh-Hans:
<pc>被科佩
夺走了红莲大宝石！
46941.zh-Hant:
<pc>被科佩
奪走了紅蓮大寶石！

46942.en:
<voice 04625_00046942><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>How amazing! I've never seen such a huge, sparkling
jewel in my life!<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46942.ja:
<voice 04625_00046942><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「たっまげたねぇ！
　こんなに　途方もなく大きくって
　キラキラした宝石　あたしゃ　はじめて見たよ！<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46942.ko:
<voice 04625_00046942><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 맙소사!
　이렇게 무식하게 크고 반짝거리는
　보석은 살면서 처음 본다!<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46942.zh-Hans:
<voice 04625_00046942><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>真是不得了啊！
我从来没见过
这么大、这么闪亮的宝石！<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46942.zh-Hant:
<voice 04625_00046942><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>真是不得了啊！
我從來沒看過
這麼大、這麼閃亮的寶石！<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46943.en:
<voice 04715_00046943><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Everythin' that falls in this here river
belongs to me, the caretaker. I'll be hangin'
onto this, thank you.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46943.ja:
<voice 04715_00046943><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「川に落ちてるもんは　み～んな
　水車小屋の管理人である　あたしのもんだわね。
　これは　あたしが　もらっておくよ。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46943.ko:
<voice 04715_00046943><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 개울에 떨어진 건 전~부 다
　물레방앗간 관리인인 내 거다.
　그러니 이건 내가 가져가마.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46943.zh-Hans:
<voice 04715_00046943><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>掉进河里的东西，
全属于我这个水车小屋的管理员。
这宝石我就收下了。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46943.zh-Hant:
<voice 04715_00046943><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>掉進河裡的東西，
全屬於我這個水車小屋的管理員。
這寶石我就收下了。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46944.en:
<voice 04885_00046944><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Alright, Grandma Kope, <pc>. It's
about time, how about we head back to the village.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46944.ja:
<voice 04885_00046944><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「さあ　コペおばあさま　<pc>さん。
　そろそろ　村に帰りましょうか。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46944.ko:
<voice 04885_00046944><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 자 코페 할머니, <pc> 씨.
　이제 그만 마을로 돌아갈까요?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46944.zh-Hans:
<voice 04885_00046944><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>走吧，科佩婆婆，<pc>。
我们该回村子了。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46944.zh-Hant:
<voice 04885_00046944><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>走吧，科佩婆婆，<pc>。
我們該回村子了。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46945.en: <voice 04930_00046945><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Hmph. I'm only goin' for my secret stash.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46945.ja:
<voice 04930_00046945><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「フン。あたしゃ　自分のヘソクリを 
　取りに帰るだけだよ。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46945.ko:
<voice 04930_00046945><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 흥, 난 내 비상금을
　챙기러 가는 것뿐이다.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46945.zh-Hans:
<voice 04930_00046945><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>哼！我只是回去拿
自己的私房钱。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46945.zh-Hant:
<voice 04930_00046945><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>哼！我只是回去拿
自己的私房錢。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46946.en: <voice 00225_00046946><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>I see, Denny still hasn't been found...<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46946.ja: <voice 00225_00046946><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「そうか　デニーは　まだ見つからんか……。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46946.ko: <voice 00225_00046946><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 그렇군, 아직도 데니를 못 찾았단 말이지…….<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46946.zh-Hans: <voice 00225_00046946><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>这样啊，还没找到丹尼……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46946.zh-Hant: <voice 00225_00046946><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>這樣啊，還沒找到丹尼……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46947.en:
<voice 00357_00046947><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>Yeah. I asked everyone around, but nobody knows
where he could be.<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46947.ja:
<voice 00357_00046947><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>「ああ。みんなに聞いてまわったけど
　誰も　姿を見てねえそうだべ。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46947.ko:
<voice 00357_00046947><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>: 응, 마을 사람들한테 빠짐없이 물어봤지만
　아무도 본 사람이 없어.<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46947.zh-Hans:
<voice 00357_00046947><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>嗯，全村的人我都问过一遍了，
没有人看到他。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46947.zh-Hant:
<voice 00357_00046947><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>嗯，全村的人我都問過一遍了，
沒有人看到他。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46948.en:
<voice 00545_00046948><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>I'll search a little more in the village...
Saval, you watch the gate.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46948.ja:
<voice 00545_00046948><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「俺は　もう少し　村ん中を探そう……。
　サヴァル　お前は　門の見張りを頼む。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46948.ko:
<voice 00545_00046948><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 나는 조금 더 마을 안을 찾아 보마…….
　사바르, 넌 문 경비를 부탁한다.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46948.zh-Hans:
<voice 00545_00046948><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>我继续在村里找找……
撒巴尔，麻烦你去把守村子的正门口。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46948.zh-Hant:
<voice 00545_00046948><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>我繼續在村裡找找……
薩瓦爾，麻煩你去把守村子的正門口。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46949.en:
<voice 00760_00046949><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>Oh! Well, if it isn't Kope. It's been awhile.
Please don't give the chief a hard time!<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46949.ja:
<voice 00760_00046949><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>「お！　コペばーさんじゃねえか。
　ずいぶん　ひさしぶりだベな。
　ガッシュのおやっさんと　ケンカすんなよ！<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46949.ko:
<voice 00760_00046949><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>: 오! 코페 할머니 아냐.
　진짜 오랜만이네.
　갓슈 아저씨랑 싸우지 마!<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46949.zh-Hans:
<voice 00760_00046949><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>嗨！这不是科佩婆婆吗？
好久不见了。
别再和加修大叔吵架了！<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46949.zh-Hant:
<voice 00760_00046949><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>嗨！這不是科佩婆婆嗎？
好久不見了。
別再和賈修大叔吵架囉！<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46950.en: <voice 00830_00046950><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Don't be ridiculous!<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46950.ja: <voice 00830_00046950><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「やーかましい！<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46951.en: <voice 00970_00046951><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>Mother! You're looking well!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46951.ja:
<voice 00970_00046951><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「おふくろォ！
　いんやあ　元気にしとったべか！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46951.ko:
<voice 00970_00046951><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 어머니!
　이야~ 잘 지내셨수!?<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46951.zh-Hans:
<voice 00970_00046951><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>老妈！
你过得还好吗？<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46951.zh-Hant:
<voice 00970_00046951><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>老媽！
妳過得還好嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46952.en:
<voice 01135_00046952><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>I don't know what I would've done if any
monsters hurt you...<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46952.ja:
<voice 01135_00046952><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「化け物にやられて　干からびとったら
　俺ァ　どうしたもんかと……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46952.ko:
<voice 01135_00046952><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 괴물한테 당해서 벌써
　삐쩍 마른 시체가 됐으면 어쩌나 싶어서……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46952.zh-Hans:
<voice 01135_00046952><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>要是你被怪物杀死变成干尸，
我可该如何是好……？<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46952.zh-Hant:
<voice 01135_00046952><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>要是妳被怪物殺死變成乾屍，
我可該如何是好……？<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46953.ja: <voice 01271_00046953><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「いってぇ！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46954.en:
<voice 01301_00046954><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Hmph! Ya' big blockhead! If you were so
worried, ya' should have picked me up
yer'self!<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46954.ja:
<voice 01301_00046954><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「フン！　このトンカチ息子！
　心配なら　自分で迎えにこんかい。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46954.ko:
<voice 01301_00046954><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 흥! 이 똥고집 아들놈!
　그리 어미가 걱정되거든
　직접 데리러 오면 되지 않느냐.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46954.zh-Hans:
<voice 01301_00046954><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>哼！笨蛋儿子！
会担心的话，怎么不自己来接我？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46954.zh-Hant:
<voice 01301_00046954><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>哼！笨蛋兒子！
會擔心的話，怎麼不自己來接我？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46955.en:
<voice 01426_00046955><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>I-I'm sorry... But I really have my hands
full right now...<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46955.ja:
<voice 01426_00046955><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「わ　悪かったべよ。
　俺も　手いっぱいでよゥ……。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46955.ko:
<voice 01426_00046955><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 미, 미안해.
　나도 일이 바빠서…….<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46955.zh-Hans:
<voice 01426_00046955><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>对、对不起嘛，
我忙到没法抽身……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46955.zh-Hant:
<voice 01426_00046955><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>對、對不起嘛，
我忙到沒辦法抽身……<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46956.en:
<voice 01476_00046956><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>I don't wanna hear yer' excuses! What about
that boy...?<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46956.ja:
<voice 01476_00046956><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「言い訳なんか　聞きたかないよ！
　それより　あの子は……？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46956.ko:
<voice 01476_00046956><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 변명 따윈 듣고 싶지 않다!
　그건 그렇고 그 아이는……?<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46956.zh-Hans:
<voice 01476_00046956><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>我不想听你的借口！
不说这个了，我的孙子呢……？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46956.zh-Hant:
<voice 01476_00046956><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>我不想聽你的藉口！
不說這個了，我的孫子呢……？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46957.en: <voice 01656_00046957><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Welcome back, Grandma!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46957.ja: <voice 01656_00046957><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「おかえり　ばーちゃん！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46957.ko: <voice 01656_00046957><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 할머니, 어서 와!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46957.zh-Hans: <voice 01656_00046957><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>奶奶，你回来了！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46957.zh-Hant: <voice 01656_00046957><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>奶奶，妳回來了！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46958.en:
<voice 01746_00046958><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Ra-Raska...! Oh, it's been so long! Look at you!
You're so big now!<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46958.ja:
<voice 01746_00046958><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「ラ　ラスカ……！
　しばらく見ないうちに　大きくなって！<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46958.ko:
<voice 01746_00046958><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 라, 라스카……!
　잠깐 못 본 사이에 키가 훌쩍 컸구나!<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46958.zh-Hans:
<voice 01746_00046958><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>拉、拉斯卡……！
一阵子没见你又长高了！<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46958.zh-Hant:
<voice 01746_00046958><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>拉、拉斯卡……！
一陣子沒見你又長高了！<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46959.en:
<voice 01836_00046959><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Huh? I'm not really that much bigger. But I've
been waiting for you to tell me more stories
about Zankrone!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46959.ja:
<voice 01836_00046959><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「えー！　オレ　そんなに背ぇ伸びてねえぞ。
　そんなことより　ザンクローネ様の話
　また聞かせてくれなっ！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46959.ko:
<voice 01836_00046959><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 에이~! 나 그렇게 많이 안 컸어.
　그보다 장크로네 님 얘기 또 해 줘!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46959.zh-Hans:
<voice 01836_00046959><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>咦？我没怎么长高啊。
先别管身高了，可不可以再多讲一点
赞库罗尼大人的故事给我听？<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46959.zh-Hant:
<voice 01836_00046959><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>咦？我沒怎麼長高啊。
先別管身高了，可不可以再多講一點
桑克朗大人的故事給我聽？<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46960.en: <voice 01936_00046960><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>What a hopeless child...<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46960.ja: <voice 01936_00046960><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「しようのない子だねえ……。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46960.ko: <voice 01936_00046960><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 하여간, 못 말린다니까…….<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46960.zh-Hans: <voice 01936_00046960><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>真拿这个孩子没辄……<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46960.zh-Hant: <voice 01936_00046960><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>真拿這個孩子沒輒……<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46961.en:
<voice 02046_00046961><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>Thank you very much for doing that for me.
I've prepared a little something for you to
show my thanks!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46961.ja:
<voice 02046_00046961><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「<pc>。お迎え　ご苦労だったベなあ。
　ささやかだけど　礼を用意させてもらっただ！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46961.ko:
<voice 02046_00046961><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 어머니를 모시고
　오느라 고생 많았다.
　별건 아니지만 답례를 준비했다!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46961.zh-Hans:
<voice 02046_00046961><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001><pc>，辛苦你了。
我为你准备了一份小小的谢礼。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46961.zh-Hant:
<voice 02046_00046961><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001><pc>，辛苦你了。
我為你準備了一份小小的謝禮。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46962.en:
<voice 02126_00046962><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>We reserved you a room at the inn here
in the village! Feel free to use it
whenever you need to rest.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46962.ja:
<voice 02126_00046962><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「お前さんには　この村の宿屋の
　びっぷるーむを　お取りしたべよ！
　休む時は　その部屋を使ってくれい。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46962.ko:
<voice 02126_00046962><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 널 위해 우리 마을 여관의
　VIP 룸을 잡아 놨다!
　쉴 때는 그 방을 쓰도록 해.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46962.zh-Hans:
<voice 02126_00046962><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>我帮你在村里的旅店
订了贵宾室！
你想休息的时候，去那里就行了。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46962.zh-Hant:
<voice 02126_00046962><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>我幫你在村裡的旅店訂了貴賓室！
你想休息的時候，去那裡就行了。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46963.en:
<voice 02216_00046963><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>The innkeeper already knows, so she'll show
you to your room if you talk to her.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46963.ja:
<voice 02216_00046963><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「宿屋の　おかみには　伝えてあっから
　話しかけりゃ　部屋まで案内してくれんべ。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46963.ko:
<voice 02216_00046963><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 여관 주인한테는 미리 말해 뒀으니
　얘기하면 방까지 안내해 줄 거다.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46963.zh-Hans:
<voice 02216_00046963><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>我已经和旅店的老板娘说好了，
你跟她说一声她就会带你去房间。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46963.zh-Hant:
<voice 02216_00046963><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>我已經和旅店的老闆娘說好了，
你跟她說一聲她就會帶你去房間。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46964.en:
<voice 02301_00046964><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>Well, I still have a lot of searching to do,
so all of you please get some rest.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46964.ja:
<voice 02301_00046964><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「ほんだら　俺は　まだ捜索が残っとるから
　おふくろたちは家に帰って　ゆっくり休めよ。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46964.ko:
<voice 02301_00046964><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 그럼 난 조금 더 수색을 해야 하니
　어머니는 돌아가서 푹 쉬쇼.<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46964.zh-Hans:
<voice 02301_00046964><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>那我就继续去找人了，
老妈你们就先回家好好休息吧。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46964.zh-Hant:
<voice 02301_00046964><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>那我就繼續去找人了，
老媽你們就先回家好好休息吧。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000500.en:
<voice 02302_29000500><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001><pc>, thank you so much for helping
out with Grandma!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000500.ja:
<voice 02302_29000500><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん
　おばあさまの　お手伝いをしてくれて
　ありがとうございました。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000500.ko:
<voice 02302_29000500><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨
　할머니를 도와주셔서 감사합니다.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000500.zh-Hans:
<voice 02302_29000500><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001><pc>，
谢谢您帮
婆婆做事。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000500.zh-Hant:
<voice 02302_29000500><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001><pc>，
謝謝您幫婆婆做事。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000501.ja:
ミシュアが
パーティから　外れた。
29000501.zh-Hans:
米修娅
脱离了队伍。
29000501.zh-Hant:
蜜雪雅
脫離了隊伍。

29000502.en: <voice 02726_29000502><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Hold on a minute. <pc>, was it?<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000502.ja:
<voice 02726_29000502><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「ちょっと　待ちな。
　あんた　<pc>って言うんだって？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000502.ko:
<voice 02726_29000502><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 잠깐 기다리거라.
　너 이름이 {pc}|hpp(이라,라)고 한다지?<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000502.zh-Hans:
<voice 02726_29000502><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>你等一下！
你是叫<pc>对吧？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000502.zh-Hant:
<voice 02726_29000502><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>你等一下！
你是叫<pc>對吧？<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46966.en:
<voice 02841_00046966><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>Hmph. I'm sorry fer takin' this away from ya earlier.
When I saw my grandson's face, I changed my mind.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46966.ja:
<voice 02841_00046966><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「フフン。さっきは　とりあげて悪かったね。
　孫の顔を見たら　気が変わったよ。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46966.ko:
<voice 02841_00046966><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: 후훗, 아까는 빼앗아서 미안했다.
　손자 얼굴을 보니 마음이 바뀌었어.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46966.zh-Hans:
<voice 02841_00046966><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>哼哼，刚才是我不好，
看见孙子之后，我改变主意了。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46966.zh-Hant:
<voice 02841_00046966><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>哼哼，剛才是我不好，
看見孫子之後，我改變主意了。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46967.en: <voice 02941_00046967><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>...Here ya' go. Take it.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46967.ja: <voice 02941_00046967><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>「……ほらよ　お駄賃だ。これ　持ってお行き。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46967.ko: <voice 02941_00046967><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>: ……옜다, 수고비다. 가져가거라.<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46967.zh-Hans: <voice 02941_00046967><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>……这是你的跑腿费，拿去吧。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46967.zh-Hant: <voice 02941_00046967><start_lip_sync n02005 _normal m00001>……這是你的跑腿費，拿去吧。<stop_lip_animation n02005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000858.en:
<pc>, once again, received the
Bright Red Gem (Key Item)!<me 60>
29000858.ja:
<pc>は　紅蓮の大宝石（だいじなもの）を
ふたたび　受け取った！<me 60>
29000858.zh-Hans:
<pc>再次收下了
红莲大宝石（重要物品）！<me 60>
29000858.zh-Hant:
<pc>再次收下了
紅蓮大寶石（重要物品）！<me 60>

46969.ja: <voice 01041_00046969><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「きゃーーーーーーーーーーーー！！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46970.en: <voice 01187_00046970><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>I-it's a monster......!!<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46970.ja: <voice 01187_00046970><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>「ば　化け物がぁ…………！！<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46970.ko: <voice 01187_00046970><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>: 괴, 괴물이…………!!<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46970.zh-Hans: <voice 01187_00046970><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>有、有怪物…………！！<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46970.zh-Hant: <voice 01187_00046970><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>有、有怪物…………！！<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46971.en: <voice 01725_00046971><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>What happened, Roti!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46971.ja: <voice 01725_00046971><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「何があっただ　ローティ！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46971.ko: <voice 01725_00046971><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 무슨 일이냐, 로오티!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46971.zh-Hans: <voice 01725_00046971><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>发生什么事了？罗提！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46971.zh-Hant: <voice 01725_00046971><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>發生什麼事了？羅蒂！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46972.en:
<voice 01808_00046972><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>This g-giant hand appeared out of nowhere
and... Dragged someone out of the village!<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46972.ja:
<voice 01808_00046972><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>「ガッシュさん……！
　きょ　巨大な手の化け物が……
　誰かを引きずって　村の外へ……。<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46972.ko:
<voice 01808_00046972><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>: 갓슈 씨……!
　거, 거대한 손 괴물이……
　누군가를 데리고 마을 밖으로…….<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46972.zh-Hans:
<voice 01808_00046972><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>加修村长……！
有、有一只巨大的手形怪物……
把一个人拖出了村子……<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46972.zh-Hant:
<voice 01808_00046972><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>賈修村長……！
有、有一隻巨大的手形怪物……
把一個人拖出了村子……<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46973.ja: <voice 01875_00046973><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「な……　なにィ！？<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46973.ko: <voice 01875_00046973><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 뭐…… 뭐라고!?<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46974.ja: <voice 02044_00046974><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>「おやっさん！！<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46975.en: <voice 02210_00046975><start_lip_sync n02010 _normal m00001>Roti, are you okay!? Are you hurt?<stop_lip_animation n02010 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46975.ja:
<voice 02210_00046975><start_lip_sync n02010 _normal m00001>「ローティ　大丈夫かい！？
　ケガしてないかい？<stop_lip_animation n02010 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46975.ko:
<voice 02210_00046975><start_lip_sync n02010 _normal m00001>: 로오티, 괜찮니!?
　다친 데는 없어?<stop_lip_animation n02010 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46975.zh-Hans:
<voice 02210_00046975><start_lip_sync n02010 _normal m00001>罗提，你还好吗？！
有没有受伤？<stop_lip_animation n02010 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46975.zh-Hant:
<voice 02210_00046975><start_lip_sync n02010 _normal m00001>羅蒂，妳還好嗎！？
有沒有受傷？<stop_lip_animation n02010 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46976.en:
<voice 02335_00046976><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>Yeah, I'm fine... But I'm more worried about that
person the monster took...<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46976.ja:
<voice 02335_00046976><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>「ええ　私は無事よ……。
　それより　連れ去られた人が
　心配だわ……。<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46976.ko:
<voice 02335_00046976><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>: 네, 전 괜찮아요…….
　그보다 끌려간 사람이
　걱정돼요…….<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46976.zh-Hans:
<voice 02335_00046976><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>嗯，我没事……
我很担心
被带走的那个人……<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46976.zh-Hant:
<voice 02335_00046976><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>嗯，我沒事……
我很擔心
被帶走的那個人……<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46977.en:
<voice 02426_00046977><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>The monster fled towards Sunbeam Square to the west
of the village.<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46977.ja:
<voice 02426_00046977><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>「あの化け物は　村の西にある
　こもれびの広場の方へ　逃げていったわ。<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46977.ko:
<voice 02426_00046977><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>: 그 괴물은 마을 서쪽에 있는
　햇살 광장 쪽으로 갔어요.<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46977.zh-Hans:
<voice 02426_00046977><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>那个怪物往村子西边的
林荫广场的方向逃走了。<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46977.zh-Hant:
<voice 02426_00046977><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>那個怪物往村子西邊的
林蔭廣場的方向逃走了。<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53432.en: <voice 02555_00053432><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>Please! Somebody help them!<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53432.ja: <voice 02555_00053432><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>「お願い！　誰か　あの人を助けてあげて！<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53432.ko:
<voice 02555_00053432><start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>: 부탁이에요!
　누가 좀 그 사람을 구해 주세요!<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 01505_00046987><start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>...Don't worry. But it's not safe here. I

<voice 03522_00047004><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>...Oh man. You're really burning up. That's what you
get for being reckless with serious injuries...<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47004.ja:
<voice 03522_00047004><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>「……やべぇ。すげー熱だ。
　大ケガしてんのに　無茶するからだよ……。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47004.ko:
<voice 03522_00047004><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>: ……큰일이야. 열이 펄펄 끓어.
　그 큰 부상을 입고 무리했으니…….<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47004.zh-Hans:
<voice 03522_00047004><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>……糟糕，发烧好严重。
谁叫你受了这么重的伤还乱动……<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47004.zh-Hant:
<voice 03522_00047004><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>……糟糕，發燒好嚴重。
誰叫你受了這麼重的傷還亂動……<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47005.en:
<voice 03587_00047005><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>I'll take Old Man Gash back to the village. Those
two... We're counting on you.<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47005.ja:
<voice 03587_00047005><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>「ガッシュのおやっさんは
　俺が責任をもって　村に連れ帰る。
　あいつらのこと……　頼むべ。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47005.ko:
<voice 03587_00047005><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>: 갓슈 아저씨는
　내가 책임지고 마을로 데려갈게.
　넌 그 녀석들을…… 부탁해.<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47005.zh-Hans:
<voice 03587_00047005><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>我负责把加修大叔
带回村子，
那两人……就拜托你了。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47005.zh-Hant:
<voice 03587_00047005><start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>我負責把賈修大叔帶回村子，
那兩個人……就拜託你了。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47006.en: <voice 00130_00047006><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>L-let go of Big Sis Mishua! You... Damn monster!!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47006.ja:
<voice 00130_00047006><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「ミ……　ミシュアねえちゃんを離せ！
　この……　化け物ヤロー！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47006.ko:
<voice 00130_00047006><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 미…… 미슈아 누나를 놔 줘!
　이…… 괴물아!!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47006.zh-Hans:
<voice 00130_00047006><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>放……放开米修娅姐姐！
你这……该死的怪物！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47006.zh-Hant:
<voice 00130_00047006><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>放……放開蜜雪雅姊姊！
你這……該死的怪物！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47007.ja: <voice 00600_00047007><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「うぐ……　あっ…………！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47007.ko: <voice 00600_00047007><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 윽…… 아아…………!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47008.ja: <shake_camera 38><voice 00805_00047008><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「やめろおおおおおおお！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47008.zh-Hans: <shake_camera 38><voice 00805_00047008><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>给我住手————！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47008.zh-Hant: <shake_camera 38><voice 00805_00047008><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>給我住手────！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000503.ja: <voice 00806_29000503><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「や……やめろ……お……。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000503.ko: <voice 00806_29000503><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 그…… 그만……해…….<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000503.zh-Hans: <voice 00806_29000503><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>住……住手……啊……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000503.zh-Hant: <voice 00806_29000503><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>住……住手……啊……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000504.en:
<voice 00807_29000504><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Big Sis Mishua.
...Big Sis Mishua!!
Damn it! I swore I'd protect you!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000504.ja:
<voice 00807_29000504><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「ミシュアねえちゃん。
　……ミシュアねえちゃん！！
　ちくしょう！　守るって誓ったのに！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000504.ko:
<voice 00807_29000504><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 미슈아 누나.
　……미슈아 누나!!
　젠장! 지키겠다고 맹세했는데!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000504.zh-Hans:
<voice 00807_29000504><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>米修娅姐姐。
……米修娅姐姐！！
可恶！我明明发誓要保护她的！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000504.zh-Hant:
<voice 00807_29000504><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>蜜雪雅姊姊。
……蜜雪雅姊姊！！
可惡！我明明發誓要保護她的！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000505.en:
<voice 00808_29000505><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Y... You're the traveler that brought back Grandma...
<pc>... Was it?<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000505.ja:
<voice 00808_29000505><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「あ……あんた　
　ばーちゃんを　連れてきてくれた
　旅人の……<pc>……だっけ？<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000505.ko:
<voice 00808_29000505><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 아…… 당신
　할머니를 데리고 온
　여행자인…… <pc>…… 맞지?<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000505.zh-Hans:
<voice 00808_29000505><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>你……你是
带奶奶回来的旅行者
……是叫……<pc>吗？<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000505.zh-Hant:
<voice 00808_29000505><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>你……你是
帶奶奶回來的旅人
……是叫……<pc>嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000506.en:
<voice 00809_29000506><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>P-please!
Let me go with you to save Big Sis Mishua
from that monster!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000506.ja:
<voice 00809_29000506><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「お……お願いだ！
　オレと一緒に　ミシュアねえちゃんを
　あの化け物から　取り返してくれ！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000506.ko:
<voice 00809_29000506><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 부…… 부탁이야!
　나랑 같이 미슈아 누나를
　저 괴물한테서 구해 줘!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000506.zh-Hans:
<voice 00809_29000506><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>拜……拜托你！
跟我一起去把米修娅姐姐
从那个怪物身边救回来！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000506.zh-Hant:
<voice 00809_29000506><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>拜……拜託你！
跟我一起去把蜜雪雅姊姊
從那個怪物身邊救回來！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000507.en:
<voice 00810_29000507><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>I-I swore! That if Zankrone couldn't come,
I'd stand in for him.<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000507.ja:
<voice 00810_29000507><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「お　オレ　誓ったんだ！
　ザンクローネ様が　来てくれないなら
　オレが　代わりになるって。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000507.ko:
<voice 00810_29000507><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 나, 나 맹세했단 말이야!
　장크로네 님이 오지 않으면
　내가 대신하겠다고.<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000507.zh-Hans:
<voice 00810_29000507><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>我、我发过誓！
如果赞库罗尼大人不来的话，
就由我来代替他。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000507.zh-Hant:
<voice 00810_29000507><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>我、我發過誓！
如果桑克朗大人不來的話，
就由我來代替他。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000508.en:
<voice 00811_29000508><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>I said I'd become the Hero...
I said I'd protect my family!!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000508.ja:
<voice 00811_29000508><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「オレが　英雄になるって……
　オレが　家族を守るって！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000508.ko:
<voice 00811_29000508><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 내가 영웅이 돼서……
　내가 가족을 지키겠다고!!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000508.zh-Hans:
<voice 00811_29000508><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>我要成为英雄……
我要保护家人！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000508.zh-Hant:
<voice 00811_29000508><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>我要成為英雄……
我要保護家人！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47009.en:
<voice 00550_00047009><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>...! You're so strong!
Amazing, you saved us!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47009.ja:
<voice 00550_00047009><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>……！　おまえ　つえーんだな！
　すっげー　助かったぞ！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47009.ko:
<voice 00550_00047009><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>……! 당신 엄청나게 강하구나!
　도와줘서 진짜 고마워!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47009.zh-Hans:
<voice 00550_00047009><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>……！你真厉害啊！
帮大忙了！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47009.zh-Hant:
<voice 00550_00047009><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>……！你真厲害啊！
幫大忙了！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47010.en: <voice 00631_00047010><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Oh, right! Big Sis Mishua!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47010.ja: <voice 00631_00047010><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「そうだ　ミシュアねえちゃん！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47010.zh-Hans: <voice 00631_00047010><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>对了，米修娅姐姐！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47010.zh-Hant: <voice 00631_00047010><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>對了，蜜雪雅姊姊！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47011.en: <voice 00790_00047011><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>I'm fine, Raska.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47011.ja: <voice 00790_00047011><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「大丈夫よ　ラスカ。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47011.ko: <voice 00790_00047011><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 난 괜찮아, 라스카.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47011.zh-Hans: <voice 00790_00047011><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我没事，拉斯卡。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47011.zh-Hant: <voice 00790_00047011><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我沒事，拉斯卡。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47012.en:
<voice 01060_00047012><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Thank you for coming to save me.
You truly are a hero!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47012.ja:
<voice 01060_00047012><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「助けにきてくれて　ありがとう。
　あなたは　立派な英雄ね！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47012.ko:
<voice 01060_00047012><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 구하러 와 줘서 고마워.
　라스카는 멋진 영웅이야!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47012.zh-Hans:
<voice 01060_00047012><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>谢谢你来救我，
你真是了不起的英雄！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47012.zh-Hant:
<voice 01060_00047012><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>謝謝你來救我，
你真是了不起的英雄！<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47013.en: <voice 01145_00047013><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Heheh! It was nothin'!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47013.ja: <voice 01145_00047013><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「へへっ！　よかった！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47013.ko: <voice 01145_00047013><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 헤헤! 다행이다!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47013.zh-Hans: <voice 01145_00047013><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>嘿嘿！太好了！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47013.zh-Hant: <voice 01145_00047013><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>嘿嘿！太好了！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47015.en: <voice 01699_00047015><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Save us, Zankrone!!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47015.ja: <voice 01699_00047015><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「助けて　ザンクローネ様ッ！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47015.ko: <voice 01699_00047015><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 구해 주세요, 장크로네 님!!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47015.zh-Hans: <voice 01699_00047015><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>救救我们，赞库罗尼大人！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47015.zh-Hant: <voice 01699_00047015><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>救救我們，桑克朗大人！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47016.en: <voice 01915_00047016><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>Even if the wheat withers...<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47016.ja: <voice 01915_00047016><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>たとえ　すべての麦が倒れ<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47016.ko: <voice 01915_00047016><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>설령 모든 밀이 쓰러지고<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47016.zh-Hans: <voice 01915_00047016><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>就算所有麦子都倒下来，<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47016.zh-Hant: <voice 01915_00047016><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>就算所有麥子都倒下來，<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47017.en: <voice 02105_00047017><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>...The water evaporates, your tears run dry...<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47017.ja: <voice 02105_00047017><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>水が干上がり　涙が枯れても<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47017.ko: <voice 02105_00047017><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>물이 바닥나고 눈물이 말라붙어도<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47017.zh-Hans: <voice 02105_00047017><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>水源和泪水全都枯竭了，<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47018.en: <voice 02240_00047018><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>Hope will remain if your voice stays true...<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47018.ja: <voice 02240_00047018><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>お前の声が　かれない限り<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47018.ko: <voice 02240_00047018><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>너의 목소리가 마르지 않는 한<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47018.zh-Hans: <voice 02240_00047018><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>只要你还能发出声音，<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47018.zh-Hant: <voice 02240_00047018><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>只要你還能發出聲音，<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47019.en: <voice 02330_00047019><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>Salvation will surely come!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47019.ja: <voice 02330_00047019><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>救いは　必ず訪れる<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47019.ko: <voice 02330_00047019><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>구원은 반드시 찾아온다<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47019.zh-Hans: <voice 02330_00047019><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>就一定会得救。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47019.zh-Hant: <voice 02330_00047019><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>就一定會得救。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47020.en: <voice 02390_00047020><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>And I will surely be there!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47020.ja: <voice 02390_00047020><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>俺は　必ず駆けつける！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47020.ko: <voice 02390_00047020><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>난 반드시 달려올 거다!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47020.zh-Hans: <voice 02390_00047020><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>我一定会赶来的！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47020.zh-Hant: <voice 02390_00047020><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>我一定會趕來的！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47021.en: <voice 02709_00047021><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Sorry to keep you waiting, kid!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47021.ja: <voice 02709_00047021><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「待たせたな　ボウズ！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47021.ko: <voice 02709_00047021><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 오래 기다렸지, 꼬맹이!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47021.zh-Hans: <voice 02709_00047021><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>让你久等了，小鬼！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47021.zh-Hant: <voice 02709_00047021><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>讓你久等了，小鬼！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47022.ja: <voice 02856_00047022><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「ザンクローネ様！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47022.ko: <voice 02856_00047022><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 장크로네 님!!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47022.zh-Hans: <voice 02856_00047022><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>赞库罗尼大人！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47022.zh-Hant: <voice 02856_00047022><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>桑克朗大人！！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47023.en:
<voice 03057_00047023><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Jeez... You do realize you'd all be screwed
without me, don't you?<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47023.ja:
<voice 03057_00047023><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「まったく　俺がいないと
　てんでダメだな　お前らは！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47023.ko: <voice 03057_00047023><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 나 원, 내가 없으니 바로 이 난리군!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47023.zh-Hans:
<voice 03057_00047023><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>真是的，少了我
你们完全不行嘛！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47023.zh-Hant:
<voice 03057_00047023><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>真是的，少了我
你們完全不行嘛！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47024.en:
<voice 03164_00047024><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Well, that's fine... Just keep quiet and watch my
back.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47024.ja:
<voice 03164_00047024><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「まあ　いいぜ……。
　黙って　俺の背中を見てな。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47024.ko:
<voice 03164_00047024><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 뭐, 됐어…….
　조용히 내 뒷모습이나 보고 있어.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47024.zh-Hans:
<voice 03164_00047024><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>算了……
乖乖躲在我背后吧。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47024.zh-Hant:
<voice 03164_00047024><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>算了……
乖乖躲在我背後吧。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47025.en: <voice 03284_00047025><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Come on, let's play! Ya dumb hand!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47025.ja: <voice 03284_00047025><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「さあ　遊ぼうか　おててちゃん。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47025.ko: <voice 03284_00047025><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 자 같이 놀아 보자고, 말썽꾸러기.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47025.zh-Hans: <voice 03284_00047025><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>陪我玩玩吧，小手手。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47025.zh-Hant: <voice 03284_00047025><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>陪我玩玩吧，小手手。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47026.en: <voice 04098_00047026><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>I'll burn your souls to a crisp!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47026.ja: <voice 04098_00047026><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「焼きあがれ！　魂が焦げるほどにッ！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47026.ko: <voice 04098_00047026><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 타올라라! 영혼이 불탈 만큼!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47026.zh-Hans: <voice 04098_00047026><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>燃烧吧！把灵魂都烧焦！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47026.zh-Hant: <voice 04098_00047026><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>燃燒吧！把靈魂都燒焦！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47027.en:
<voice 04952_00047027><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Sooooooooo cooooooool!
So you really are still alive!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47027.ja:
<voice 04952_00047027><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「カ……　カッケーーーーー！！
　ザンクローネ様　やっぱり生きてたんだな！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47027.ko:
<voice 04952_00047027><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 머…… 멋있다~~~~~!!
　장크로네 님은 역시 살아 있었어!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47027.zh-Hans:
<voice 04952_00047027><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>好……好帅———！！
赞库罗尼大人果然还活着！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47027.zh-Hant:
<voice 04952_00047027><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>好……好帥───！！
桑克朗大人果然還活著！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47028.en:
<voice 05153_00047028><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>I won't go down that easy. But, well... This time,
I'm feeling pretty beat.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47028.ja:
<voice 05153_00047028><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「そう簡単にゃ　くたばんねえよ。
　だけど　まあ……
　今回ばかりは　そこそこ　まいったぜ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47028.ko:
<voice 05153_00047028><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 난 그렇게 쉽게 죽지 않아.
　하지만……
　이번에는 나도 좀 애먹었어.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47028.zh-Hans:
<voice 05153_00047028><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我才不会那么简单就挂掉。
不过……
这次确实挺惨的。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47028.zh-Hant:
<voice 05153_00047028><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我才不會那麼簡單就掛掉。
不過……
這次確實蠻慘的。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47029.en:
<voice 05274_00047029><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>The damage I took in my last battle left me
stuck. I turned my soul into that crystal and
gave myself time to recover.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47029.ja:
<voice 05274_00047029><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「前の戦いの時　負ったダメージで
　ろくに　身体が動かなくなっちまってな。 
　魂を結晶化させて　回復に専念してたのさ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47029.ko:
<voice 05274_00047029><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 지난 전투에서 입은 대미지 때문에
　몸을 제대로 움직일 수가 없었거든.
　그래서 영혼을 결정화해 회복에 전념했지.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47029.zh-Hans:
<voice 05274_00047029><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>由于上次战斗时受的伤太重，
我的身体几乎动不了。 
所以我需要把灵魂化为结晶，专心治疗伤势。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47029.zh-Hant:
<voice 05274_00047029><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>由於上次戰鬥時受的傷太重，
讓我的身體幾乎動不了。 
所以我需要把靈魂化為結晶，專心治療傷勢。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47030.en:
<voice 05349_00047030><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Hey, you! What was your name again...
Oh yeah! <cs_pchero>!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47030.ja:
<voice 05349_00047030><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「おい　お前！　なんてったっけ……
　そうだ　<cs_pchero>！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47030.ko:
<voice 05349_00047030><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 이봐, 너! 이름이 뭐였더라……
　그래, <cs_pchero>!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47030.zh-Hans:
<voice 05349_00047030><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>喂，你！名字叫什么来着……
对了，<cs_pchero>！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47030.zh-Hant:
<voice 05349_00047030><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>喂，你！名字叫什麼去了……
對了，<cs_pchero>！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47031.en:
<voice 05410_00047031><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>I could feel your burning soul when you held
my crystal... It really helped my wounds heal
faster. I owe you one!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47031.ja:
<voice 05410_00047031><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「お前の懐にいた時　熱い魂の鼓動を感じた。
　おかげで　キズが早く癒えたのさ。
　……恩に着るぜ！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47031.ko:
<voice 05410_00047031><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 네 품 속에 있을 때
　뜨거운 영혼의 고동을 느꼈다.
　덕분에 상처가 빨리 회복됐어. 고맙다!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47031.zh-Hans:
<voice 05410_00047031><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>在你身上的时候，我感受到你那炽热灵魂的鼓动。
多亏了你，我才能提早恢复伤势。
……谢谢你了！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47031.zh-Hant:
<voice 05410_00047031><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>在你身上的時候，我感受到你那熾熱靈魂的鼓動。
多虧了你，我才能提早恢復傷勢。
……謝謝你啦！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47032.en:
<voice 05519_00047032><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>And then... Raska. Your voice definitely got through
to me.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47032.ja:
<voice 05519_00047032><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「それから……　ラスカ。
　俺を呼ぶ声　確かに届いたぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47032.ko:
<voice 05519_00047032><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 그리고…… 라스카.
　날 부르던 목소리, 똑똑히 들었다.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47032.zh-Hans:
<voice 05519_00047032><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>还有……拉斯卡，
我听到你呼唤我的声音了。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47032.zh-Hant:
<voice 05519_00047032><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>還有……拉斯卡，
我聽到你呼喚我的聲音了。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47033.en:
<voice 05590_00047033><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Never give up hope.
Leave Melsandy Village to me!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47033.ja:
<voice 05590_00047033><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「どんな時も　希望は捨てんな。
　メルサンディ村は　俺とともにある！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47033.ko:
<voice 05590_00047033><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 그 어떤 순간에도 희망은 잃지 마라.
　메르상디 마을은 나와 함께 있으니까!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47033.zh-Hans:
<voice 05590_00047033><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>无论什么时候都不能舍弃希望。
梅尔桑蒂村与我同在！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47033.zh-Hant:
<voice 05590_00047033><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>無論什麼時候都不能捨棄希望。
梅爾桑蒂村與我同在！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47034.en: <voice 05719_00047034><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>H-hey, Zankrone, wait!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47034.ja: <voice 05719_00047034><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「ま　待ってよー！　ザンクローネ様ー！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47034.ko: <voice 05719_00047034><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 기, 기다려! 장크로네 님~!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47034.zh-Hans: <voice 05719_00047034><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>等、等一下！赞库罗尼大人！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47034.zh-Hant: <voice 05719_00047034><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>等、等一下！桑克朗大人！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74056.en: <voice 05789_00074056><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Wait here, Mishua!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74056.ja: <voice 05789_00074056><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「ねーちゃんたち　ここで待ってろよ！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74056.ko: <voice 05789_00074056><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 누나랑 다들 여기서 기다려!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74056.zh-Hans: <voice 05789_00074056><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>姐姐你们在这里等着！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74056.zh-Hant: <voice 05789_00074056><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>姊姊你們在這裡等著！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47035.en:
<voice 06009_00047035><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>...Thank you, <cs_pchero>. I think
it's your being here that this miracle
happened.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47035.ja:
<voice 06009_00047035><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「……ありがとう　<cs_pchero>さん。
　あなたが　来てくれたから
　こんな奇跡が　起こったんだと思うの。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47035.ko:
<voice 06009_00047035><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: ……고마워요, <cs_pchero> 씨.
　<cs_pchero> 씨가 와 준 덕분에
　이런 기적이 일어난 거예요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47035.zh-Hans:
<voice 06009_00047035><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>……谢谢你，<cs_pchero>，
幸好你赶来，
才会发生奇迹。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47035.zh-Hant:
<voice 06009_00047035><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>……謝謝你，<cs_pchero>，
幸好你趕來，
才會發生奇蹟。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47036.en: <voice 06189_00047036><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>I knew it. Heroes never die...<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47036.ja: <voice 06189_00047036><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「やっぱり　英雄は　死なないのね……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47036.ko: <voice 06189_00047036><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 역시 영웅은 죽지 않는군요……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47036.zh-Hans: <voice 06189_00047036><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>英雄果然是不会死的……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47036.zh-Hant: <voice 06189_00047036><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>英雄果然是不會死的……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47037.en: <voice 06339_00047037><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Heroes... Never... Die...<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47037.ja: <voice 06339_00047037><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「勇……は……　死な…な…い……。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47037.ko: <voice 06339_00047037><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 용……는…… 죽지… 않…아…….<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47037.zh-Hans: <voice 06339_00047037><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>勇者……是……不……会……死……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47037.zh-Hant: <voice 06339_00047037><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>勇者……是……不……會……死……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47038.en: <voice 06619_00047038><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>......I have to go.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47038.ja: <voice 06619_00047038><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「…………行かなきゃ。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47038.zh-Hans: <voice 06619_00047038><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>…………我得走了。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47038.zh-Hant: <voice 06619_00047038><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>…………我得走了。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47039.en: <voice 06809_00047039><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>I lost sight of Zankrone...<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47039.ja: <voice 06809_00047039><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「ザンクローネ様　見失っちまった……。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47039.ko: <voice 06809_00047039><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 장크로네 님, 결국 놓쳤어…….<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47039.zh-Hans: <voice 06809_00047039><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>赞库罗尼大人不知到哪去了……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47039.zh-Hant: <voice 06809_00047039><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>桑克朗大人不知到哪去了……<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47040.en:
<voice 06909_00047040><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Huh? Where's Mishua? Did she head home
already?<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47040.ja:
<voice 06909_00047040><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「……あれ？
　ミシュアねえちゃんは　どこ行ったんだ？
　先に　帰っちゃったのか？<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47040.ko:
<voice 06909_00047040><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: ……어?
　미슈아 누나는 어디 갔어?
　먼저 간 거야?<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47040.zh-Hans:
<voice 06909_00047040><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>……咦？
米修娅姐姐到哪去了？
她先回去了吗？<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47040.zh-Hant:
<voice 06909_00047040><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>……咦？
蜜雪雅姊姊到哪去了？
她先回去了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47041.en:
<voice 07115_00047041><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>This is Mishua's, isn't it? Kinda careless to
just leave it here... I'll give it to her later.<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47041.ja:
<voice 07115_00047041><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「これって　ねえちゃんの　かみかざりだよな？
　落とすなんて　そそっかしいぜ……。
　あとで　渡してやるか。<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47041.ko:
<voice 07115_00047041><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 이건 누나의 머리 장식이잖아?
　이런 데 떨어뜨리기나 하고 덜렁거리긴…….
　나중에 돌려줘야겠다.<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
